So he would write and\nthunder \u201c According to the Manusmriti, Brahma created the Brahmins, Kshatriyas,\nVaishyas and Shudras from his mouth, hands, thighs, and feet respectively, Shudras\nare pigs! &nbsp;Food becomes polluted and\nunfit for consumption when a pig smells it, or hens and cock fly over it, or\nwhen a dog looks at it, or when a Shudra touches it. If a Shudra talks ill of a\nBrahmin his tongue should be cut. &nbsp;Again,\nif a Shudra pronounces the name of a Brahmin, talks of his caste, or accuses\nhim, a ten inches long red hot iron rod ( hark\u2014it is NOT 11 inches TEE HEEEEE )\nshould be thrust into his mouth. If a Shudra dares to give moral lessons to a\nBrahmin, he should be punished by pouring hot oil in his ear and mouth. &nbsp;If a Shudra hits a Brahmin, his hands must be\ncut off. If a Shudra occupies the same seat as a Brahmin, he is to be punished\nby branding his waist with hot rod and or getting his buttocks cut! If a Shudra\nleaves his profession and adopts the profession of a higher caste, the king\nshould confiscate his property and expel him from his kingdom. In contrast to\nthis, Brahmins are to be subjected to mild punishment only.If a Brahmin is\nawarded death sentence, it is sufficient to shave his head, but all others,\nincluding the Shudras, have to actually die\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVR\u2019s made a huge faux\npaus once \u2013 he said \u201c Tamil is a language of barbarians \u201c.&nbsp; Till his death he had NO answer as to why he\nsaid this or why he married a very young woman at an old age.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-r6umMpMllVM/U2pIMuzWpFI/AAAAAAAAsDk/eo-42JK8rFk/s1600/5401190976_7f90ddd3e07d_z.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"452\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-r6umMpMllVM/U2pIMuzWpFI/AAAAAAAAsDk/eo-42JK8rFk/s1600/5401190976_7f90ddd3e07d_z.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: &nbsp;Periyar, Jinnah and Ambedkar. &nbsp;Rothschild's stooges to drive fissures into Hindusim for divide and rule. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red;\">Discussion topic ? - HOW TO SCREW HINDUISM AND HINDUS.</span></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JzyydtfLLBQ/UflbAzlCd_I/AAAAAAAAkxw/wXYxNnjyenw/s1600/350px-Periyar_with_Jinnah_and_Ambedkar.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"252\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JzyydtfLLBQ/UflbAzlCd_I/AAAAAAAAkxw/wXYxNnjyenw/s400/350px-Periyar_with_Jinnah_and_Ambedkar.JPG\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bali is a proud Hindu\ncommunity, a small island pocket of sole Hindu majority district in an\notherwise Muslim country. Hinduism has not just survived here, it has thrived,\nunscathed by the tumultuous events of India's history over thousands of years. &nbsp;Hindus is easily recognizable--the rituals,\nculture, traditions, rites of passage, etc. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1kj5LbpIhkI/Ufm9QpfaCGI/AAAAAAAAk0Y/z2Ef9e5U9mc/s1600/julia-roberts-goes-hindu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1kj5LbpIhkI/Ufm9QpfaCGI/AAAAAAAAk0Y/z2Ef9e5U9mc/s400/julia-roberts-goes-hindu.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The main city,\nDenpasar, is a major tourist destination, but many Hindus live in \"custom\nvillages\" run in a wonderfully traditional manner. If one comes with an open\nheart and mind, anyone with any sensitivity who comes to Bali will experience\nits healing energy and come away from it totally changed for the better. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Really you have to\nexperience this. &nbsp;Bali is a magical\nplace, where at least you can enrich your experience , if you do NOT need\npersonal transformation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Has the world known any\npeace since Judaism, Christianity and Islam were born ?&nbsp; What is the need to aggressively convert people\nfrom other religions to Islam by sword and Christianity by deceit?&nbsp; Proselyting is unknown in Hinduism. You\nconvert on your own free will. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RiGw3aAIRTA/UfnKhIP42oI/AAAAAAAAk1g/dEIh_hjR41I/s1600/images.jpgibuifui.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"306\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RiGw3aAIRTA/UfnKhIP42oI/AAAAAAAAk1g/dEIh_hjR41I/s320/images.jpgibuifui.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where ever you look in\nBali you see &nbsp;beauty unbound, everyone you\nmeet give a a gift of their graceful smiles and gentle spirituality, to give\nyou the feeling that you are welcome and one of them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are some in India\nwho do NOT know the great ancient structures built across the planet by great\nancient architects who left India on Vimanas, using the Golden mean of 1.618 of\nthe antique 10500 year old Sri Yantra geometry of Hinduism.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-d8ASY8kRUz4/UfnCDAvfZJI/AAAAAAAAk0o/Myr3E00mU44/s1600/000+(7).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Egyptian pyramids were built using the Sri\nYantra &nbsp;base angle of 51 deg 49 minutes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>SRI YANTRA ,108 AND\nTHEORY OF EVERYTHING VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today Westerners say\nthat only if you experience the essence of Hindu India and Bali can your &nbsp;spirit be cleansed. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Broken from inside and mentally wrecked Western\ntourists go &nbsp;to &nbsp;Bali and India and leave feeling totally healed\nand reborn . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-V3npa0odaIk/UfnKCD0LMiI/AAAAAAAAk1Q/13NoatMObZk/s1600/huggingcow.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They take the graceful spirit\nof &nbsp;Hinduism with them and they are\ngrateful for this unique experience. &nbsp;They attend meditation, yoga and temple\nceremony sessions for spiritual exploration.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wsvttxL2HQo/UfnJ4PBqJUI/AAAAAAAAk1I/DeI-y_yf6HM/s1600/balitirtaempul2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first sign of being healed is that\nthey start doing Namaste.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balinese Hindus perform\nTrikal Sandhya, reciting the Gayatri Mantra and other Sanskrit slokas every day\nat 6am, noon and 6pm -- a practice found in India among brahmins.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every Balinese home has\na small temple, where they make &nbsp;flower\nofferings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hari Raya Nyepi, &nbsp;is the Day of Silence in which the island\ncomes to a complete halt. No TV no radio. Even the electricity is shut off. &nbsp;On New Year's Eve the villages are cleaned,\nfood is cooked for two days and in the evening as much noise is made as\npossible to scare away the devils.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus stay indoors, praying , meditating and fasting. &nbsp;No vehicles are on the roads, the airport is\nclosed and tourists must remain in their hotels. Even Muslims and Christians\nco-operate. People relax and recover their frayed vocal chords strained the\nprevious day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Trimurti of Brahma,\nVishnu and Siva are the most popular Gods in Bali for the common man. Yet in\nthe main temples they do NOT have a idol. &nbsp;Western historians have written that the idols\nwere removed as the Bali Hindus were afraid of the Muslims. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are wrong. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Advaita concept of\nHinduism considers the Supreme as empty space within an atom in which the electrons\nwhizz around\u2014the morphogenetic consciousness field , or BrahmAn. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-H13ir_fFasU/UfqLYgZq2-I/AAAAAAAAk4Y/FOOvHfOo850/s1600/images.jpgde2qcq.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"187\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-H13ir_fFasU/UfqLYgZq2-I/AAAAAAAAk4Y/FOOvHfOo850/s400/images.jpgde2qcq.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why in India there are NO temples for\nBrahma , the creator. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>ADVAITA VEDANTA\nPHILOSOPHY , ADI SHANKARACHARYA 2000 BC VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahma is seen in\nEllora caves with 4 heads. &nbsp;This\nrepresents four dimensions of space time, which Albert Einstein lifted from\nHindusim. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Did somebody say Oh yeah?</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Till the Western\nscientists got their hands on ancient Indian Vedic scriptures which dealt with Vimanas\n, they did NOT know about time dilation. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Until the beginning of\nthe 20th century, time was believed to be independent of motion, progressing at\na fixed rate in all reference frames; however, later experiments revealed that\ntime slows at higher speeds of the reference frame relative to another\nreference frame. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Such slowing, called\ntime dilation, is explained in special relativity theory. Many experiments have\nconfirmed time dilation, such as the relativistic decay of muons from cosmic\nray showers and the slowing of atomic clocks aboard a Space Shuttle relative to\nsynchronized Earth-bound inertial clocks. The duration of time can therefore\nvary according to events and reference frames.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>There are several\nevents in ancient Hindu scriptures.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Let me just quote one\nof them from Srimad-Bhagavatam 9.3.28-32<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>There is a story of a\nking named Kakudmi, who was able to travel to the world of Brahma and\nexperience Brahma\u2019s scale of time. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Taking his own\ndaughter, Revati, Kakudmi went to Lord Brahma in Brahmaloka, which is\ntranscendental to the three modes of material nature, and inquired about a\nhusband for her. When Kakudmi arrived there, Lord Brahma was engaged in hearing\nmusical performances by the Gandharvas and had not a moment to talk with him.\nTherefore Kakudmi waited, and at the end of the musical performances he offered\nhis obeisances to Lord Brahma and thus submitted his long-standing desire.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>After hearing his words,\nLord Brahma, who is most powerful, laughed loudly and said to Kakudmi, \u201cO King,\nall those whom you may have decided within the core of your heart to accept as\nyour son-in-law have passed away in the course of time. Twenty-seven\ncatur-yugas have already passed. Those upon whom you may have decided are now\ngone, and so are their sons, grandsons, and other descendants. You cannot even\nhear about their names.\u201d <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>King Kakudmi\u2019s visit to\nBrahmaloka took 27 times 4,320,000 earth years. Brahma\u2019s time King Kakudmi\u2019s\nvisit lasted 3,456 seconds, or just under an hour. &nbsp;The king had had to wait for a musical\nperformance to finish before having a brief conversation with Lord Brahma.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oAyG6zzIamM/UfumyALJpDI/AAAAAAAAk7Y/NYnpz2bcv5w/s1600/images.jpgcr4h6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oAyG6zzIamM/UfumyALJpDI/AAAAAAAAk7Y/NYnpz2bcv5w/s1600/images.jpgcr4h6.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>According to the\nSrimad- Bhagavatam the physical universe is surrounded by a shell, and\nBrahmaloka is located very close to that shell. The Bhagavatam gives the\ndiameter of this shell as 500 million yojanas, which, using the standard figure\nof 8 miles per yojana, comes out to 4 billion miles.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_Ln5Q8XWg4Q/UfumgvwlkFI/AAAAAAAAk7Q/DjyQYDCNJ5Q/s1600/vr4u56r.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_Ln5Q8XWg4Q/UfumgvwlkFI/AAAAAAAAk7Q/DjyQYDCNJ5Q/s1600/vr4u56r.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The space travelers\ncould return to Earth billions of years in the future. A scenario based on this\nidea was presented in the novel Planet of the Apes by Pierre Boulle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spacetime is interpreted\nwith space as existing in three dimensions and time playing the role of a\nfourth dimension that is of a different sort from the spatial dimensions. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ObGgjpk-v80/UfoGqNT5X-I/AAAAAAAAk3g/SxDUSjLlrzo/s1600/images.jpgfdjhndc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"338\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ObGgjpk-v80/UfoGqNT5X-I/AAAAAAAAk3g/SxDUSjLlrzo/s400/images.jpgfdjhndc.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Space and time are unified in a\nfour-dimensional Minkowski continuum called spacetime, whose metric treats the\ntime dimension differently from the three spatial dimensions . &nbsp;Spacetime is thus not a Euclidean space.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Ot4g3BI9d_I/UfnsSSmm4rI/AAAAAAAAk2Q/btbCe4MLic4/s1600/the-worship-of-creator.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Ot4g3BI9d_I/UfnsSSmm4rI/AAAAAAAAk2Q/btbCe4MLic4/s400/the-worship-of-creator.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201c<i>Brahma has four heads</i>\" (\u015ar\u012bmad Bh\u0101gavatam 12.8.2\u20135). </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MGfPvOwSLPg/Ufnsb21LDuI/AAAAAAAAk2Y/LxrwehANh2A/s1600/images.jpgfeqafc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MGfPvOwSLPg/Ufnsb21LDuI/AAAAAAAAk2Y/LxrwehANh2A/s400/images.jpgfeqafc.jpg\" width=\"277\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Brahma is shapeless. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">He is beyond quantity\nand quality.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you see the immoral reasons\nthe white Christian historian has given for Indian Hindus NOT worshipping\nBrahma , you will split your sides with laughter. Mind you they have painfully\ninjected all these fake stories in our ancient scriptures using Sanskrit\nscholars. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They even injected\npoison that &nbsp;Brahma originally had five\nheads. One of them was cut down by Shiva when he got pissed off with Brahma.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>TEE HEEEE !!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wanna know more? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>RIDICULOUS STORY NO 1:</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahma is not worshiped\nbecause of a curse by the great sage Brahmarishi Bhrigu. &nbsp;The high priest Bhrigu was organising a great\nfire-sacrifice on Earth. It was decided that the greatest among all Gods would\nbe made the presiding deity. Bhrigu then set off to find the greatest among the\nTrimurti. When he went to Brahm\u0101, the god was so immersed in the music played\nby Saraswati that he could hardly hear Bhrigu's calls. The enraged Bhrigu then\ncursed Brahm\u0101 that no person on Earth would ever invoke him or worship him\nagain. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>BLAH BLAH </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>RIDICULOUS STORY NO 2:</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the beginning of\ntime in the Cosmos, Vishnu and Brahm\u0101 approached a huge Shiva linga and set out\nto find its beginning and end. Vishnu was appointed to seek the end and Brahma\nthe beginning. Taking the form of a boar, Vishnu began digging downwards into\nthe earth, while Brahma took the form of a swan and began flying upwards.\nHowever, neither could find His appointed destination. Vishnu, satisfied, came\nup to Shiva and bowed down to him as a swarupa of Brahman. Brahm\u0101 did not give\nup so easily. &nbsp;As He was going up, he saw\na ketaki flower, dear to Shiva. His ego forced him to ask the flower to bear\nfalse witness about Brahm\u0101's discovery of Shiva's beginning. When Brahm\u0101 told\nhis tale, Shiva, the all-knowing, was angered by the former's ego. Shiva thus\ncursed him that no being in the three worlds will worship him. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>BLAH BLAH BLAH .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><b>RIDICULOUS STORY NO 3:</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahma created a woman\nin order to aid him with his job of creation. She was called Shatarupa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was so beautiful\nthat Brahma became infatuated with her, and gazed at her wherever she went.\nThis caused her extreme embarrassment and Shatarupa tried to turn from his\ngaze.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But in every direction\nshe moved, Brahma sprouted a head until he had developed four. &nbsp;Finally, Shatarupa grew so frustrated that she\njumped to try to avoid his gaze. Brahma, in his obsession, sprouted a fifth\nhead on top of all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is also said in some\nsources that Shatarupa kept changing her form. She became every creature on earth\nto avoid Brahma. He however, changed his form to the male version of whatever\nshe was and thus every animal community in the world was created.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Shiva admonished\nBrahma for demonstrating behaviour of an incestuous nature and chopped off his\nfifth head for 'unholy' behaviour. Since Brahma had distracted his mind from\nthe soul and towards the cravings of the flesh, Shiva's curse was that people\nshould not worship Brahma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">As a form of\nrepentance, it is said that Brahma has been continually reciting the four Vedas\nsince this time, one from each of his four heads. &nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">BLAH BLAH BLAH BLAH&nbsp;</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Really it is NOT worth\nputting these ridiculous and immoral stories down. I can never imagine a Hindu\ninjecting poison into the Bible, though there is so much of scope.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Wanna know what First\nCorinthians 7.36 says in the Old Testament?&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t , it is NOT worth it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can check the\ndoctored and spun version in the New Testaments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>QUOTE: if any man\nthinks that he is acting unbecomingly toward his virgin daughter, if she is\npast her youth, and if it must be so, let him do what he wishes, he does not\nsin : UNQUOTE </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oYOvt_P4_lg/Ufnmmzwad0I/AAAAAAAAk14/Ov9s9-_iFpU/s1600/download.jpgbdhrt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"309\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oYOvt_P4_lg/Ufnmmzwad0I/AAAAAAAAk14/Ov9s9-_iFpU/s400/download.jpgbdhrt.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">New International\nVersion<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">If anyone is worried\nthat he might not be acting honorably toward the virgin he is engaged to, and\nif his passions are too strong and he feels he ought to marry, he should do as\nhe wants. He is not sinning. They should get married.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">New Living Translation<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">But if a man thinks\nthat he's treating his fiancee improperly and will inevitably give in to his\npassion, let him marry her as he wishes. It is not a sin.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">English Standard\nVersion<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">If anyone thinks that\nhe is not behaving properly toward his betrothed, if his passions are strong,\nand it has to be, let him do as he wishes: let them marry\u2014it is no sin.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">New American Standard\nBible <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">But if any man thinks\nthat he is acting unbecomingly toward his virgin daughter, if she is past her\nyouth, and if it must be so, let him do what he wishes, he does not sin; let\nher marry.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; He is not sinning; they can get\nmarried. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">International Standard\nVersion<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">If a man thinks he is\nnot behaving properly toward his virgin, and if his passion is so strong that\nhe feels he ought to marry her, let him do what he wants; he isn't sinning. for he feared to dwell in Zoar: and\nhe dwelt in a cave, he and his two daughters.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\">31 And the firstborn said unto the younger, Our father is\nold, and there is not a man in the earth to come in unto us after the manner of\nall the earth:<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\">32 Come, let us make our father drink wine, and we will lie\nwith him, that we may preserve seed of our father.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\">33 And they made their father drink wine that night: and the\nfirstborn went in, and lay with her father; and he perceived not when she lay\ndown, nor when she arose.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\">34 And it came to pass on the morrow, that the firstborn\nsaid unto the younger, Behold, I lay yesternight with my father: let us make\nhim drink wine this night also; and go thou in, and lie with him, that we may\npreserve seed of our father.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\">35 And they made their father drink wine that night also:\nand the younger arose, and lay with him; and he perceived not when she lay\ndown, nor when she arose.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\">36 Thus were both the daughters of Lot with child by their\nfather.</span></i><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ENOUGH OF NONSENSE\u2014 GETTING\nBACK <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Lj4Xg9e0GyE/Ufo_MYWxVdI/AAAAAAAAk4A/l9by5U7FHbg/s1600/stock-footage-hindu-mother-temple-of-besakih-pura-besakih-agung-vulcano-bali-indonesia.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Above: Besakih temple of Bali</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balinese are under the\nimpression that Maharishi Markandeya who brought Hinduism to Bali around 500 AD.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;They\nare misled by the white Christian historian and they are wrong. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharishi Markandeya\nhappened more than 13000 years ago. &nbsp;He\nwas the sole witness to the cosmic deluge as per the Vedas written in Sanskrit 7000\nyears ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THE BANYAN TREE AND\nSINGULARITY VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bali youth remain\nproud of their Balinese culture even under the influence of more than two\nmillion tourists arriving yearly. &nbsp;A\nvillage in Bali is called a desha, which normally means country in Sanskrit. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each desha has three temples, one each for\nBrahma, Vishnu and Siva. The Brahma temple is placed near the village center,\nVishnu's near the farms and Siva's near the cremation grounds<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Balinese believe in\nthe laws of karma . Due to this principle, people are afraid of doing wrong\nactions, which would only bring them trouble in their next life. Crime is less\nand hence the reason why tourist love this place\u2014even after the deadly Muslim\nterror attacks.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xV01Qr4d0N4/Ufo-1ZtLTqI/AAAAAAAAk3w/Br88a4ATq6k/s1600/Bali+Yoga+655x437-5b1b3d71-e733-4e54-ac61-b83973e19a32-0-655x437.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xV01Qr4d0N4/Ufo-1ZtLTqI/AAAAAAAAk3w/Br88a4ATq6k/s400/Bali+Yoga+655x437-5b1b3d71-e733-4e54-ac61-b83973e19a32-0-655x437.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are over ten\nthousand teachers of Hinduism in Indonesia's schools. Priests are highly\nrespected. They survive on the offerings of devotees, and the devotees\nunderstand this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is an Indian\nCultural Centre, Bali, in the heart of Denpasar.&nbsp; &nbsp;The\nIndian staff includes a yoga teacher and a dance instructor. &nbsp;The center participates in all major\nfestivals, conducts classes in yoga,&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bharatanatyam dance and Hindi, and issues\n30 scholarships a year for Hindu Indonesian students to study in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/--f1y-Yrxp-8/Ufo-92pFKoI/AAAAAAAAk34/xrKElyvMOeE/s1600/wisata-bali.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--f1y-Yrxp-8/Ufo-92pFKoI/AAAAAAAAk34/xrKElyvMOeE/s400/wisata-bali.jpg\" width=\"326\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are no idols or\nmurtis in the temples of Bali , as they believe in the advaita form of Hinduism.\n&nbsp;During puja, they focus the mind on the\ntemple's pedestal or padmasana and invite the God to come, then they make\nofferings. &nbsp;They identify the padmasana\nby putting different colors for each God: red for Brahma, black for Vishnu and\nwhite for Shiva.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India, the guardians\nof society are the police, but here every street and corner of the village is\ncovered by the pachalaks. &nbsp;Pachalaks are\nordinary citizens, not police, who keep a vigilant eye on the activities of the\ncommunity. &nbsp;It is like the neighborhood\nwatch scheme . &nbsp;In the past Muslim police\nhad connived with jealous Islamic terrorists. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NU4gxBIwkkk/Ufo_amO1tcI/AAAAAAAAk4I/CQvzfXNWeR8/s1600/vishnu_bust_park_bali.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NU4gxBIwkkk/Ufo_amO1tcI/AAAAAAAAk4I/CQvzfXNWeR8/s640/vishnu_bust_park_bali.jpg\" width=\"425\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Above: Vishnu bust in a Bali park. &nbsp;Muslims had vandalised it.</span></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rest of the Hindu\nworld should look at the Balinese people and thank them for upholding their\nculture so strongly. The rest of the world prays as individuals and as a\nfamily. But the Balinese pray as a person, as a family, as a community, as a\nsociety and even as a nation. They pray together on all kinds of good or bad\noccasions. This integrates the society, binding them together and bringing a\nstrong sense of brotherhood<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Balinese have\nreduced Christian conversion significantly by opening Hindu orphanages, serving\nchildren without parents as well as some from poor families unable to care for\nthem. There are now eight Hindu orphanages \u2013 as the immoral Christian missionaries\nhad opened up 41 orphanages (Madrassa style ) to lure the Hindus away.</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Balinese enter\ntheir temples with shoes on. Only for puja they remove their shoes ..</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They make it compulsory to wear dhoti ( sarong\n).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balinese eat meat and are NOT vegetarian. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only their priests are vegetarian. In Bali\nschools they recite Gayatri Mantra 3 times a day. .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many of the local radio stations also relay Trikala\nSandhya three times a day</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>GAYATRI MANTRA VIDEO ,\nNINA HAGEN &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">and</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>POWER OF MANTRAS ON\nHUMAN CONSCIOUSNESS &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Check out the <b><span style=\"color: red;\">Sandhya Vandanam</span></b> video below:</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/bU2RWGmzhv0/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/bU2RWGmzhv0&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/bU2RWGmzhv0&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is said that one who\ndoes not perform Sandhyavandanam is ever impure and is thus rendered unfit to\nperform the other Vedic rites.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sandhya Kala is a time of junction.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ta-fnvOvtH4/UrdAL4E_z0I/AAAAAAAAohA/VJ9ItznPdAY/s1600/internalpowercenters-thumb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"330\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ta-fnvOvtH4/UrdAL4E_z0I/AAAAAAAAohA/VJ9ItznPdAY/s400/internalpowercenters-thumb.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<i style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The earth (bhur), the\nplanets (bhuvah), and the galaxies (swah) are moving at a very great velocity,\nthe sound produced is Om, (the name of formless God.) That God (tat), who\nmanifests Himself in the form of light of suns (savitur) is worthy of bowing /\nrespect (varenyam). We all, therefore, should meditate (dheemahi) upon the\nlight (bhargo) of that deity (devasya) and also do chanting of Om. May He (yo)\nguide in right direction (prachodayat) our (nah) intellect dhiyo</span></i><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the time when there is a change from darkness to light or from light to\ndarkness. Also a change from an ascending sun to a descending sun in the sky is\nalso considered as the Sandhya Kala.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Manu Smriti states\nthat great Rishis have been performing Sandhya prayers for longer times due to\nwhich they have been blessed with longevity, intelligence, fame, goodwill and divine\neffulgence.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nT<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">he sayam sandhyavandana should be started before\nsunset and concluded&nbsp; at sunset (at local\ntime) before the green flash. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>GREEN FLASH AT SUNSET\nAND PERCEPTION VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as in the villages\nin India, mothers here&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">do not allow their children to go out after dark. They\nalso have the system of lemon and green chillies being used to prevent the evil\nforces from acting on their dear ones.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Mother Temple,\nBESAKIH &nbsp;is the holiest in all of Bali.\nIt is located at 3,610 feet on the slopes of Bali's highest mountain, Mount\nAgung, an active volcano rising 10,308 feet. Lava flows from a huge 1962\neruption that killed 2,000 people missed the temple by just a few meters.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1N5reErznjU/UfqQhz4wO2I/AAAAAAAAk4o/Jt0vmVAgjt4/s1600/7.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"316\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1N5reErznjU/UfqQhz4wO2I/AAAAAAAAk4o/Jt0vmVAgjt4/s400/7.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People\ndid NOT abandon the temple and continued praying at great risk to their lives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AE0Q22NvW1o/UfqQnTWTokI/AAAAAAAAk4w/0ihLZ1W8p3g/s1600/5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"296\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AE0Q22NvW1o/UfqQnTWTokI/AAAAAAAAk4w/0ihLZ1W8p3g/s400/5.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Balinese believe\nAgung is a fragment of India's Mount Meru, brought by the first Hindus. Mother\nBesakih Temple is, in fact, a complex made up of 22 temples.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its numerous\ncourtyards and brick gateways are connected by stepped terraces and flights of\nstairs which finally lead up to the central shrine. . Tourism generates a lot\nof money for Bali and Hinduism is a great money spinner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bali is one of the\nworld\u2019s most prominent rice growers. Every farm has a temple dedicated to Shri\nDevi and Bhu Devi (Lakmi the Goddess of wealth and mother earth - the two\ndivinities that stand on the either of side of Tirupati Bala ji in India). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/xlPyHfBFehw/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/xlPyHfBFehw&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/xlPyHfBFehw&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No farmer will perform his agricultural duties\nwithout first making offerings to Shri Devi and Bhu Devi. . There is a special\nritual of lifting the sacred book, carrying it in a procession, bringing [it]\nto a special place, doing the bhumi puja, worshipping the ground there and\nconsecrating the ground, then placing the book there. Then the priest will sit\nand recite mantras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">The 9th century\nPrambanan Shiva temple, the largest Hindu temple in Indonesia. (See below)</span></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dzqbCj2b2J4/UfsZsb1puYI/AAAAAAAAk5A/yo4EKZQ070M/s1600/prambanan_temple_indonesia_original.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"425\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dzqbCj2b2J4/UfsZsb1puYI/AAAAAAAAk5A/yo4EKZQ070M/s640/prambanan_temple_indonesia_original.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of these Hindu temples have been broken up by Muslims. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One Babri Masjid where NO worship was being done, built on top of an ancient Ram temple of Ayodhya created so much ruckus. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But thousands of Hindu temples broken up by Muslims is normal, right?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google search-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">BABRI MASJID DEMOLITION\n, MUGHAL EMPEROR BABUR VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">THE UNQUANTIFIED\nHOLOCAUST AND GENOCIDE &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-f16c2EP485Q/UfsaFBsE4YI/AAAAAAAAk5I/ThnGIk48I44/s1600/5923700808_6ea6ae8557_z.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The temples of\nthe far East are huge , ancient and astonishing. The white Christian historian have dated all\nof them as a couple of hundred years old , to be in consonance with the\nridiculous Christian version of the big bang at 4004 BC. &nbsp;It is so easy to find out the real age, with modern Carbon dating.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
