, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Prambanan</span></b>, named after\nthe village, is the biggest temple complex in Java. It is actually a huge Hindu\ntemple complex about 15 km north-east of Yogyakarta.. Main shrine is dedicated\nto Shiva.. Prambanan temple was originally named Shivagrha.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2f7b_fLIwRM/UfunHO1sfpI/AAAAAAAAk7g/5JSSMdmdkdE/s1600/prambana.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"379\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2f7b_fLIwRM/UfunHO1sfpI/AAAAAAAAk7g/5JSSMdmdkdE/s640/prambana.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was designed as\nthree concentric squares.&nbsp; In all there were\n240 temples in the entire complex. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prambanan temple\nofficially caught the international attention in early 19th century. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_puGGTKmu9M/UfvGtznIQAI/AAAAAAAAk8Q/r9AsjVP-ka0/s1600/images.jpgrqeghte.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"350\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_puGGTKmu9M/UfvGtznIQAI/AAAAAAAAk8Q/r9AsjVP-ka0/s400/images.jpgrqeghte.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1811\nduring Britain\u2019s short-lived rule of the Dutch East Indies, Colin Mackenzie, a\nsurveyor in the service of Sir Thomas Stamford Raffles, came upon the temples\nby chance.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zwS7AUyCbfI/UfunghRX09I/AAAAAAAAk7o/yTGKfOUZ_cY/s1600/sunset-at-the-prambanan.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"427\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zwS7AUyCbfI/UfunghRX09I/AAAAAAAAk7o/yTGKfOUZ_cY/s640/sunset-at-the-prambanan.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\">The amazing temple &nbsp;was left to rot for decades .&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-k_RlOXy9miI/UfvGUGQmyoI/AAAAAAAAk8I/YqHadoW8PRg/s1600/MVC-267S_3.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\"><i>Above : Samudra Manthan -- destroyed by Muslims.</i></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\">Dutch residents carted &nbsp;off sculptures as garden ornaments and native Muslim villagers using the foundation stones for construction material. &nbsp;Jealous Muslims destroyed whatever they could destroy.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sKTlV26TQBg/UfvGF0gAhXI/AAAAAAAAk8A/tTvlCkilt30/s1600/ganesha_yeh_pulu_bali.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sKTlV26TQBg/UfvGF0gAhXI/AAAAAAAAk8A/tTvlCkilt30/s400/ganesha_yeh_pulu_bali.jpg\" width=\"265\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Half-hearted\nexcavations by archaeologists in the 1880s merely facilitated looting. &nbsp;Rather they encouraged it under influence of Islamic and Christian interests. Why should a&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\">glorious</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Hindu temple be exhumed.</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-srzCygVcvXE/UfvF4fJ2GJI/AAAAAAAAk74/FqlJRiuLiJc/s1600/images.jpgfjhrtjtr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"265\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-srzCygVcvXE/UfvF4fJ2GJI/AAAAAAAAk74/FqlJRiuLiJc/s400/images.jpgfjhrtjtr.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reconstruction of the compound began in 1918, and proper restoration only in\n1930. The temple was damaged during the May 2006 Java earthquake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MhmrmSaFm8E/UfvhYnB37sI/AAAAAAAAk9A/Pj7Df36jD60/s1600/candi_sewu_stone_blocks.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Above : Candi Sewu&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ljLhsr2SJSc/UfvhrbC75aI/AAAAAAAAk9I/xwFGOSKOzI4/s1600/18841623-entrance-in-brahma-temple-top-in-candi-prambanan-or-candi-rara-jonggrang-hindu-temple-java-indonesia.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Above : Prambanan Brahma temple</i></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism remains the\nmost attacked and under siege of all the major world religions. This is in\nspite of the fact that Hinduism is the most tolerant, pluralistic and synthetic\nof the world\u2019s major religions.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet\nthough Hindu gurus have called for respect for all religions, leaders of other UNHAPPY\nreligions have not responded in kind by offering any respect for Hinduism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead they have\ncontinued to promote their missionary agendas and plan the conversion of India\nto their beliefs. Hinduism is the largest of the non-conversion, non-proselytizing\nreligions and so offers the greatest possibilities for conversion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the\nvulnerability of Hinduism that makes it a target, not the fact that Hindus are\ntrying to convert or conquer the world for some hostile belief. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While missionaries are\nvirtually banned in China and in Islamic countries, in India they are often\ntolerated, respected and given a wide scope of activity. Since Christianity is\nin decline, particularly in Europe, it has a need to find new converts for\nwhich India is one of main potential locations, particularly as a comparatively\nhigh percentage of Hindu converts are willing to become priests and nuns. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-e0cX6plOsnU/UfvmTrpMMNI/AAAAAAAAk9Y/0k6usbQa2x8/s1600/cccc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-e0cX6plOsnU/UfvmTrpMMNI/AAAAAAAAk9Y/0k6usbQa2x8/s320/cccc.jpg\" width=\"210\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pope John Paul II in a\ntrip to India few years ago spoke directly of looking for a \u201crich harvest of\nsouls in the third millennium in Asia\u201d, specifically India as part of Joshua\nProject 2. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N0hgNQ1F14A/UfvmbPw9OlI/AAAAAAAAk9g/aVwhcn7NqXQ/s1600/bbggtt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N0hgNQ1F14A/UfvmbPw9OlI/AAAAAAAAk9g/aVwhcn7NqXQ/s1600/bbggtt.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">US President Bush\npromised in USA Today on September 21, 2000, he would allocate $80 billion over\n10 years in tax incentives to help US churches provide social services.&nbsp; USAID ( which has a CIA link ) funds\nChristian NGOs in India .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its&nbsp; US\ntrans-national Christian NGOs like World Vision and CARE are more involved in\nconversions to Christianity than development initiatives in India, which is\njust&nbsp; a mere front.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism is a way of\nlife &nbsp;based on principles or evolved over\ntime , code of&nbsp; Dharma. &nbsp;It is a relentless pursuit of truth, flexible\nto suit all situations. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Hindu feels happy as\na Hindu to meet people of other faiths, and converse with them, without being\nburdened by the conviction , that my religion is the best, and i have embarked\non the right path, that every one else has missed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">15% of the people on\nthis planet are Hindu. This percentage is increasing not by sops given by immoral\nmissionaries or by brute force\u2014but by the inherent grace and charm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">The wheel has turned full circle -- yes the tide has turned, worldwide !!..</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6552808749782475247\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_81M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/15979155757638092451\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Soujanya V</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1526200132315#c6552808749782475247\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 13, 2018 at 1:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_81MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nNamaskaram Sir - The Star of David in your blog reminded me of a question that I had. padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_80B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_80M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1526203911204#c5219340577511807900\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 13, 2018 at 3:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_80MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">IN ANCIENT DAYS KERALA WAS KNOWS AS DRAVIDAM.</span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">DRAVYA</span>&nbsp;IS AYURVEDIC PLANT DERIVED \u201cHERB \u201c---- \u201c&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">EVIDAM</span>&nbsp;\u201d MEANS PLACE IN MALAYALAM..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHERBS MUST HAVE CARBON IN THE FORMULA.. IT IS ORGANIC ( NOT INORGANIC LKE SIDDHA MEDICINES )\u2014VANASPATI/ VANSPATYA/ AUSHADI/ VIRUDHA..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">IN CHARAKA SAMHITA PENNED 6200 YEARS AGO , DRAVYA MUST BE POORNAM ( MOIETY )..OR ELSE THERE WILL BE SIDE EFFECTS ..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nDravyaguna (pharmacology) deals comprehensively about rasa , guna , virya, vipaka and prabhava (pharmacokinetics and pharmcodynamics) of herbs\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThere are five concepts of the substance, namely:--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nrasa (taste),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ngu\u1e47a (properties),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nv\u012brya (potency),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nvip\u0101ka (rasa after digestion and metabolism)</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nand prabh\u0101va (specific pharmacological effect),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u2014which determine and explain the pharmacological behavior of a substance.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nKERALA HAS , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0915\u0943\u092a\u093e\u0915\u091f\u093e\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0927\u094b\u0930\u0923\u0940\u0928\u093f\u0930\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0926\u0941\u0930\u094d\u0927\u0930\u093e\u092a\u0926\u093f</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u093f\u0928\u094b\u0926\u092e\u0947\u0924\u0941</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0941\u0928\u093f</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span> 3 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Dara darendra nandini vilasa bhandhu bhandura,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Sphuradigantha santhathi pramodha mana manase,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Krupa kadaksha dhorani niruddha durdharapadi,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Kwachi digambare mano vinodhamethu vasthuni. 3<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMay my mind seeks bliss happiness in Lord Shiva , in whose\nmind the glorious universe and all the living-beings exist, Who is the charming\nsportive-friend of the daughter of the mountain-king of the Earth (i.e.\nHim\u0101laya), Whose uninterrupted series of merciful-glances conceals\nimmense-troubles, who is all pervasive ( directions as His clothes) .[3]<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u091c\u091f\u093e\u092d\u0941\u091c\u0919\u094d\u0917\u092a\u093f\u0919\u094d\u0917\u0932\u0938\u094d\u092b\u0941\u0930\u0924\u094d\u092b\u0923\u093e\u092e\u0923\u093f\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u093e</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0915\u0926\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0915\u0941\u0919\u094d\u0915\u0941\u092e\u0926\u094d\u0930\u0935\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0932\u093f\u092a\u094d\u0924\u0926\u093f\u0917\u094d\u0935\u0927\u0942\u092e\u0941\u0916\u0947</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092e\u0926\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0938\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0941\u0930\u0938\u094d\u092b\u0941\u0930\u0924\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0917\u0941\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0930\u0940\u092f\u092e\u0947\u0926\u0941\u0930\u0947</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092e\u0928\u094b</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u093f\u0928\u094b\u0926\u092e\u0926\u094d\u092d\u0941\u0924\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092c\u093f\u092d\u0930\u094d\u0924\u0941</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092d\u0942\u0924\u092d\u0930\u094d\u0924\u0930\u093f</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span>\n4 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Jada bhujanga pingala sphurath phana mani prabha,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Kadamba kumkuma drava praliptha digwadhu mukhe,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Madhandha sindhura sphurathwagu utthariya medhure,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Mano vinodhamadhbutham bibarthu bhootha bharthari. 4</i></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMay my mind hold in \u015aiva, by Whom \u2014 with the light from the\njewels of the shining-hoods of creeper-like yellow-snakes \u2014 the face of\nDikkany\u0101s\u2019 are smeared with Kadamba-juice like red Ku\u0144kuma, Who looks dense due\nto the glittering skin-garment of an intoxicated elephant, and Who is the Lord\nof the ghosts.[4]<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u0939\u0938\u094d\u0930\u0932\u094b\u091a\u0928\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u0943\u0924\u094d\u092f\u0936\u0947\u0937\u0932\u0947\u0916\u0936\u0947\u0916\u0930</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0938\u0942\u0928\u0927\u0942\u0932\u093f\u0927\u094b\u0930\u0923\u0940</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u093f\u0927\u0942\u0938\u0930\u093e\u0919\u094d\u0918\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092a\u0940\u0920\u092d\u0942\u0903</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092d\u0941\u091c\u0919\u094d\u0917\u0930\u093e\u091c\u092e\u093e\u0932\u092f\u093e</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u093f\u092c\u0926\u094d\u0927\u091c\u093e\u091f\u091c\u0942\u091f\u0915</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0936\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f\u0948</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u091a\u093f\u0930\u093e\u092f</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u091c\u093e\u092f\u0924\u093e\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u091a\u0915\u094b\u0930\u092c\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0941\u0936\u0947\u0916\u0930\u0903</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span> 5 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Sahasra lochana prabhoothyasesha lekha shekhara,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Prasoona dhooli dhorani vidhu sarangri peedabhu,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Bhujangaraja Malaya nibhadha jada jhootaka,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Sriyai chiraya jayatham chakora bandhu shekhara. 5<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nFor a long time, may \u015ahiva \u2014 Whose foot-stool is grey due to\nthe series of pollen dust from flowers at the head of Indra (Sahasralocana) and\nall other demi-gods, Whose matted hairlocks are tied by a garland of the king\nof snakes, and Who has a head-jewel of the friend of cakora bird \u2014 produce\nprosperity.[5]<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0932\u0932\u093e\u091f\u091a\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0930\u091c\u094d\u0935\u0932\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0928\u091e\u094d\u091c\u092f\u0938\u094d\u092b\u0941\u0932\u093f\u0919\u094d\u0917\u092d\u093e</span>-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n-<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u093f\u092a\u0940\u0924\u092a\u091e\u094d\u091a\u0938\u093e\u092f\u0915\u0902</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u092e\u0928\u094d\u0928\u093f\u0932\u093f\u092e\u094d\u092a\u0928\u093e\u092f\u0915\u092e\u094d</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u0941\u0927\u093e\u092e\u092f\u0942\u0916\u0932\u0947\u0916\u092f\u093e</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u093f\u0930\u093e\u091c\u092e\u093e\u0928\u0936\u0947\u0916\u0930\u0902</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092e\u0939\u093e\u0915\u092a\u093e\u0932\u093f\u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u0926\u0947\u0936\u093f\u0930\u094b\u091c\u091f\u093e\u0932\u092e\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0941</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u0903</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span> 6 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Lalata chathwara jwaladhanam jaya sphulingabha,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Nipeetha pancha sayagam saman nilimpanayakam,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Sudha mayookha lekhaya virajamana shekharam,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Maha kapali sampade, siro jadalamasthu na. 6</i></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMay we acquire the wealth of Siddhis from the tress-locks of\n\u015aiva, Which absorbed the five-arrows (of K\u0101madeva) in the sparks of the blazing\nfire stored in the rectangular-forehead, Which is bowed to by celestial leaders\n, Which have an enticing-forehead with a beautiful streak of crescent-moon.[6]<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0915\u0930\u093e\u0932\u092b\u093e\u0932\u092a\u091f\u094d\u091f\u093f\u0915\u093e\u0927\u0917\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0917\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0917\u091c\u094d\u091c\u094d\u0935\u0932</span>-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0928\u091e\u094d\u091c\u092f\u093e\u0927\u0930\u0940\u0915\u0943\u0924\u092a\u094d\u0930\u091a\u0923\u094d\u0921\u092a\u091e\u094d\u091a\u0938\u093e\u092f\u0915\u0947</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0927\u0930\u093e\u0927\u0930\u0947\u0928\u094d\u0926\u094d\u0930\u0928\u0928\u094d\u0926\u093f\u0928\u0940\u0915\u0941\u091a\u093e\u0917\u094d\u0930\u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0930\u092a\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0915</span>-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n-<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0915\u0932\u094d\u092a\u0928\u0948\u0915\u0936\u093f\u0932\u094d\u092a\u093f\u0928\u093f</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0924\u094d\u0930\u093f\u0932\u094b\u091a\u0928\u0947</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092e\u0924\u093f\u0930\u094d\u092e\u092e</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span> 7 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Karala bhala pattika dhagadhaga jjwala,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Ddhanam jayahuthi krutha prachanda pancha sayage ,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Dharadharendra nandhini kuchagra chithrapathraka,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Prakalpanaika shilpini, trilochane rather mama. 7</i></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMay I find pleasure in three eyed Shiva&nbsp; (Trilocana ), Who offered the five\ngreat-arrows (of K\u0101madeva) to the blazing and chattering fire of the plate-like\nforehead, and Who is the sole-artist placing decorative artistic lines on the\nbreasts of the daughter of Him\u0101laya (P\u0101rvat\u012b).[7]<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u0935\u0940\u0928\u092e\u0947\u0918\u092e\u0923\u094d\u0921\u0932\u0940</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u093f\u0930\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0926\u0941\u0930\u094d\u0927\u0930\u0938\u094d\u092b\u0941\u0930\u0924\u094d</span>-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0915\u0941\u0939\u0942\u0928\u093f\u0936\u0940\u0925\u093f\u0928\u0940\u0924\u092e\u0903</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092c\u0928\u094d\u0927\u092c\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0941\u0915\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0930\u0903</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u093f\u0932\u093f\u092e\u094d\u092a\u0928\u093f\u0930\u094d\u091d\u0930\u0940\u0927\u0930\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0928\u094b\u0924\u0941</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0915\u0943\u0924\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0938\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0941\u0930\u0903</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0915\u0932\u093e\u0928\u093f\u0927\u093e\u0928\u092c\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0941\u0930\u0903</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0936\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u091c\u0917\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0941\u0930\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0930\u0903</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span> 8 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Naveena megha mandali nirudha durdharath sphurath,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Kahoo niseedhi neethama prabhandha bandha kandhara,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Nilimpa nirjari darsthanothu kruthi sindhura,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Kala nidhana bandhura sriyam jagat durandhara. 8</i></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMay \u015ahiva \u2014 Whose cord-tied neck is dark like a night with\nshining-moon obstructed by layers of&nbsp;\nclouds, Who holds the celestial River Ga\u0144g\u0101, Whose cloth is made of\nelephant-skin, Who has a curved and crescent moon placed at the forehead, and\nWho bears the universe \u2014 expand my wealth.[8]<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092b\u0941\u0932\u094d\u0932\u0928\u0940\u0932\u092a\u0919\u094d\u0915\u091c\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092a\u091e\u094d\u091a\u0915\u093e\u0932\u093f\u092e\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092d\u093e</span>-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n-<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u093f\u0932\u092e\u094d\u092c\u093f\u0915\u0923\u094d\u0920\u0915\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0932\u0940\u0930\u0941\u091a\u093f\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092c\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0915\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0930\u092e\u094d</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u094d\u092e\u0930\u091a\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0926\u0902</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u0941\u0930\u091a\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0926\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092d\u0935\u091a\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0926\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092e\u0916\u091a\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0926\u0902</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0917\u091c\u091a\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0926\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0915\u091a\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0926\u0902</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0924\u092e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0915\u091a\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0926\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092d\u091c\u0947</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span>\n9 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Prafulla neela pankaja prapancha kalima prabha,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Valambhi kanda kanthali ruchi prabandha kandharam,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Smarschidham puraschidham bhavaschidham makhachidham,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Gajachidandakachidham tham anthakachidham bhaje. 9</i></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nI adore \u015ahiva, Who supports the dark glow of blooming blue\nlotus series at around the girdle of His neck, , who is the killer of Manmatha\n, Who destroyed Triputra ( Atlantis ), Who cut-off the bonds of wordly mundane\nexistence, Who destroyed the sacrifice (of Dak\u1e63ha , father of Sati ), Who\ndestroyed demon Andhaka the destroyer of elephants , and Who controls Yama\n(death).[9]<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0905\u0917\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u092e\u0919\u094d\u0917\u0932\u093e\u0915\u0932\u093e\u0915\u0926\u092e\u094d\u092c\u092e\u091e\u094d\u091c\u0930\u0940</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0930\u0938\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0935\u093e\u0939\u092e\u093e\u0927\u0941\u0930\u0940</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u093f\u091c\u0943\u092e\u094d\u092d\u0923\u093e\u092e\u0927\u0941\u0935\u094d\u0930\u0924\u092e\u094d</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u094d\u092e\u0930\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0915\u0902</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u0941\u0930\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0915\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092d\u0935\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0915\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092e\u0916\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0915\u0902</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0917\u091c\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0915\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0915\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0915\u0902</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0924\u092e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0915\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0915\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092d\u091c\u0947</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span>\n10 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Agarva sarva mangalaa kalaa kadamba manjari,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Rasa pravaha madhuri vijrumbha mana madhu vrtham,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Suranthakam, paranthakam, bhavanthakam, makhandakam,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Gajandhakandhakandakam thamanthakanthakam bhaje. 10</i></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nI pray to Lord Shiva, who has bees flying all over because\nof the sweet honey from the beautiful bunch of auspicious Kadamba flowers, who\nis the killer of Manmatha, who destroyed Tripuras, who destroyed the bonds of\nworldly life, who destroyed the sacrifice, who destroyed the demon Andhaka, the\nkiller of the elephants, and who controlled the God of death, Yama.(10)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u091c\u092f\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0926\u092d\u094d\u0930\u0935\u093f\u092d\u094d\u0930\u092e\u092d\u094d\u0930\u092e\u0926\u094d\u092d\u0941\u091c\u0919\u094d\u0917\u092e\u0936\u094d\u0935\u0938</span>-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n-<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093f\u0928\u093f\u0930\u094d\u0917\u092e\u0924\u094d\u0915\u094d\u0930\u092e\u0938\u094d\u092b\u0941\u0930\u0924\u094d\u0915\u0930\u093e\u0932\u092b\u093e\u0932\u0939\u0935\u094d\u092f\u0935\u093e\u091f\u094d</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0927\u093f\u092e\u093f\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093f\u092e\u093f\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093f\u092e\u093f\u0927\u094d\u0935\u0928\u0928\u094d\u092e\u0943\u0926\u0919\u094d\u0917\u0924\u0941\u0919\u094d\u0917\u092e\u0919\u094d\u0917\u0932</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0936\u093f\u0935\u0903</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span>\n11 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Jayathwadhabra vibramadbujaamga maswasath,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Vinirgamath, kramasphurath, karala bhala havya vat,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Dhimi dhimi dhimi dhwanan mrudanga thunga mangala,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Dhwani karma pravarthitha prachanda thandawa shiva. 11</i></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMay \u015ahiva, Whose forehead has oblations of turbulent and\nfiery snake-hisses \u2014&nbsp; whirling out\nand&nbsp; sparking, Whose fierce t\u0101\u1e47\u1e0dava-dance\nis set in motion by the sound-series of the auspicious drum (\u1e0damaru) \u2014 which is\nsounding with \u2018dhimit-dhimit\u2019 sounds, be victorious.[11]<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0926\u0943\u0937\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093f\u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0924\u0932\u094d\u092a\u092f\u094b\u0930\u094d\u092d\u0941\u091c\u0919\u094d\u0917\u092e\u094c\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0915\u0938\u094d\u0930\u091c\u094b\u0930\u094d</span>-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n-<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0917\u0930\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0920\u0930\u0924\u094d\u0928\u0932\u094b\u0937\u094d\u0920\u092f\u094b\u0903</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u0941\u0939\u0943\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093f\u092a\u0915\u094d\u0937\u092a\u0915\u094d\u0937\u092f\u094b\u0903</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0924\u0943\u0937\u094d\u0923\u093e\u0930\u0935\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0926\u091a\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0941\u0937\u094b\u0903</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u091c\u093e\u092e\u0939\u0940\u092e\u0939\u0947\u0928\u094d\u0926\u094d\u0930\u092f\u094b\u0903</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u092e\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0924\u092f\u0928\u094d\u092e\u0928\u0903</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0915\u0926\u093e</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u0926\u093e\u0936\u093f\u0935\u0902</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092d\u091c\u0947</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span> 12 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Drusha dwichi thra thalpayor bhujanga moukthika srajo,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Garishta rathna loshtayo suhrudhwi paksha pakshayo,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Trunara vinda chakshusho praja mahee mahendrayo,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Samapravarthika kadha sadashivam bhajamyaham. 12</i></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen will I worship Lord Sad\u0101\u015biva with an equal vision\ntowards varied ways of the world, a snake or a pearl-garland, royal-gems or a\nlump of dirt, friend or enemy , a grass-eyed or a lotus-eyed person, and common\nmen or the king.[12]<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0915\u0926\u093e</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u093f\u0932\u093f\u092e\u094d\u092a\u0928\u093f\u0930\u094d\u091d\u0930\u0940\u0928\u093f\u0915\u0941\u091e\u094d\u091c\u0915\u094b\u091f\u0930\u0947</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u0938\u0928\u094d</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u093f\u092e\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0926\u0941\u0930\u094d\u092e\u0924\u093f\u0903</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u0939\u0928\u094d</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u093f\u092e\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0932\u094b\u0932\u0932\u094b\u091a\u0928\u094b</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0932\u0932\u093e\u091f\u092b\u093e\u0932\u0932\u0917\u094d\u0928\u0915\u0903</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0936\u093f\u0935\u0947\u0924\u093f</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0930\u092e\u0941\u091a\u094d\u091a\u0930\u0928\u094d</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u0926\u093e</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u0941\u0916\u0940</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092d\u0935\u093e\u092e\u094d\u092f\u0939\u092e\u094d</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span> 13 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Kada nilampa nirjaree nikunja kotare vasan,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Vimuktha durmathee sada sirasthanjaleem vahan,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Vilola lola lochano lalama bhala lagnaka,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Shivethi manthamucharan kada sukhee bhavamyaham. 13</i></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nLiving in the hollow of a tree in the thickets of River\nGa\u0144g\u0101, always free from ill-thinking, bearing a\u00f1jali at the forehead, free from\nlustful eyes, and forehead and head bonded, when will I become content while\nreciting the mantra \u2018\u2018\u015ahiva?\u2019\u2019[13]<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0907\u092e\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0939\u093f</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u093f\u0924\u094d\u092f\u092e\u0947\u0935\u092e\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924\u092e\u0941\u0924\u094d\u0924\u092e\u094b\u0924\u094d\u0924\u092e\u0902</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0935\u0902</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u0920\u0928\u094d\u0938\u094d\u092e\u0930\u0928\u094d\u092c\u094d\u0930\u0941\u0935\u0928\u094d\u0928\u0930\u094b</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u093f\u0936\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093f\u092e\u0947\u0924\u093f\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0924\u092e\u094d</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0939\u0930\u0947</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0917\u0941\u0930\u094c</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u0941\u092d\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093f\u092e\u093e\u0936\u0941</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092f\u093e\u0924\u093f</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u093e\u0928\u094d\u092f\u0925\u093e</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0917\u0924\u093f\u0902</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0935\u093f\u092e\u094b\u0939\u0928\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0939\u093f</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0926\u0947\u0939\u093f\u0928\u093e\u0902</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u0941\u0936\u0919\u094d\u0915\u0930\u0938\u094d\u092f</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u091a\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0928\u092e\u094d</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span> 14 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Imam hi nithya meva muktha muthamothamam sthavam,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Padan, smaran broovan naro vishudhimethi santhatham,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Hare Gurou subhakthimasu yathi nanyadha gatheem,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Vimohinam hi dehinaam sushakarasya chithanam. 14</i></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhoever reads, remembers and says this best stotra as it is\nsaid here,gets purified for ever, and obtains devotion in the great Guru Shiva.\nFor this devotion, there is no other way. Just the mere thought of Lord Shiva\nindeed removes the delusion. (14)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u0942\u091c\u093e\u0935\u0938\u093e\u0928\u0938\u092e\u092f\u0947</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0926\u0936\u0935\u0915\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0917\u0940\u0924\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092f\u0903</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0936\u092e\u094d\u092d\u0941\u092a\u0942\u091c\u0928\u092a\u0930\u0902</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u0920\u0924\u093f</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0926\u094b\u0937\u0947</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0964</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0930\u0925\u0917\u091c\u0947\u0928\u094d\u0926\u094d\u0930\u0924\u0941\u0930\u0919\u094d\u0917\u092f\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093e\u0902</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0932\u0915\u094d\u0937\u094d\u092e\u0940\u0902</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u0926\u0948\u0935</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0936\u092e\u094d\u092d\u0941\u0903</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span> 15 <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Poojavasana samaye dasa vakhra geetham,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Ya shambhu poojana param padthi pradhoshe,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Thasya sthiraam radha gajendra thuranga yuktham,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Lakshmeem sadaiva sumukheem pradadathi shambu. 15</i></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAt the time of prayer after sunset , whoever utters this\nstotra by Da\u015bavaktra (R\u0101va\u1e47a) after the prayer of \u015aambhu \u2014 \u015aambhu gives him\nstable wealth including chariots, elephants and horses, and beautiful face.[15]<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n||<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0925\u0936\u093f\u0935\u0924\u093e\u0923\u094d\u0921\u0935\u0938\u094d\u0924\u094b\u0924\u094d\u0930\u092e\u094d</span>\n||<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ||<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940\u0917\u0923\u0947\u0936\u093e\u092f</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u092e\u0903</span> ||<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ithi Ravana krutham,<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Shiva thandava stotram,<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sampoornam.</span></i><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThus ends the Shiva-Tandava Stotra written by Ravana.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n&nbsp;The stotra is in panchachAmara\nChanda, in which there are 16 varna-s per line, each line begins with a laghu\nand the laghu and guru varna-s alternate. So there are eight LG (laghu-guru)\npairs, making up 16 syllables of each line.&nbsp;\nThe last shloka is in Vasanta-tilakA metre.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-baiGPgvnq4E/Ufvn8HjOJ8I/AAAAAAAAk9w/meM-gykBVz8/s1600/vadakayil+fcol+1.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-baiGPgvnq4E/Ufvn8HjOJ8I/AAAAAAAAk9w/meM-gykBVz8/s320/vadakayil+fcol+1.JPG\" width=\"210\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">..</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt.
