, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yagoda joined the\nBolsheviks in 1907 and became a member of the presidium of the Cheka (Soviet\nsecret police) in 1920. He was a deputy chairman of the Cheka\u2019s successor\norganization, OGPU, from 1924 to 1934 and from 1930 was in charge of the system\nof forced-labour camps in the Soviet Union.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A close, longtime associate of\nStalin, Yagoda became in 1934 a member of the Central Committee of the\nCommunist Party and was put in charge of the newly organized Commissariat of\nInternal Affairs, or NKVD, into which the secret police had been absorbed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genrikh Grigoryevich\nYagoda was the Stalin appointed director of the NKVD, the Soviet Union's\nsecurity and intelligence agency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On July 10, 1934, Joseph Stalin appointed the Jew Yagoda as People's\nCommissar for Internal Affairs. Yagoda poisoned his superior Menzhinsky.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genrik Yagoda was a\ncomplete contrast to the aristocratic Menzhinsky. He was of peasant origin from\nLatvia, lacking in education, uncouth in manners and speech, but possessed of\nan obstinate streak that refused to take \"no\" for an answer and a\nruthless determination not to allow any man who served under him to make a\nmistake more than once.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was Yagoda who\nensured that the organisation was to be devoted entirely to dealing with\nStalin's enemies. \"The enemies of Stalin are the enemies of Russia,\"\nsaid Yagoda. \"The enemies of others are of less account and can be dealt\nwith by others. The Special Division is to ensure that no enemies of Stalin\ncontinue to live.\"</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Practically everyone\nknows the \"Hitler killed 6 million Jews\" myth, but nobody &nbsp;knows the \"Yagoda &nbsp;killed more than 10 million non-Jews\"\nfact. &nbsp;&nbsp;Stalin's Jewish henchman , Genrikh Yagoda,\nsporting the exact same funny moustache as Hitler..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nobel prize winner and Historian Aleksandr Isayevich\nSolzhenitsyn writes that when the Jewish commissar Genrikh Yagoda headed the\nSoviet secret police, and Yagoda's black vans went out every night in St.\nPetersburg, known then as Leningrad, to round up \"class enemies\":\nformer members of the aristocracy--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- former civil servants, former businessmen,\nformer teachers and professors and professional people, any Russian -- any real\nRussian -- who had graduated from a university. A quarter of the population of\nthe city was arrested and liquidated by Yagoda during this two-year period.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And Solzhenitsyn\nlaments that the citizens of St. Petersburg cowered behind their doors when the\nblack vans pulled up at their apartment houses night after night to arrest\ntheir neighbors.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If only the decent Russians had fought back, Solzhenitsyn\nsays, if only they had ambushed some of these secret police thugs in the\nhallways of their apartments with knives and pickaxes and hammers, if only they\nhad spiked the tires of the police vans while the thugs were in the apartments\ndragging out their victims, they could easily have overwhelmed Yagoda's forces\nand forced an end to the mass arrests.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But they didn't fight back, and the\narrests and liquidations continued. And so, Solzhenitsyn concludes, because of\ntheir cowardice and their selfishness the Russians deserved what the communists\ndid to them.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mc_DbcWXyvM/Ue1dULzrywI/AAAAAAAAkec/HWJBaUzJlqo/s1600/images.jpgafbtr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mc_DbcWXyvM/Ue1dULzrywI/AAAAAAAAkec/HWJBaUzJlqo/s400/images.jpgafbtr.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yagoda managed the Gulag\nsystem. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Russian citizens were rounded up\nby the millions and put into Soviet forced-labor camps called gulags. Many\ngulag prisoners died from over-work, malnourishment or disease. Prisoners were\nalso abused - for example, some were forced to eat human feces. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-H25a_vJtGP4/Ue1dLzUTxOI/AAAAAAAAkeU/bvy3RFXDl_s/s1600/tumblr_lr5zq3Ot9w1qbkxnto1_400.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-H25a_vJtGP4/Ue1dLzUTxOI/AAAAAAAAkeU/bvy3RFXDl_s/s640/tumblr_lr5zq3Ot9w1qbkxnto1_400.jpg\" width=\"435\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Above: The last breath on planet earth for this unfortunate man.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other were routinely beaten or left in\nfreezing temperatures. A prisoner who was unable to reach quota - i.e. perform\na set amount of work per day - was deprived of food or other necessities, which\noften led to the prisoner's death.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vWDm2kgi6FM/Ue1dFCSJTZI/AAAAAAAAkeM/X0NgaFqUM4E/s1600/4116981095_1def7e81cd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"425\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vWDm2kgi6FM/Ue1dFCSJTZI/AAAAAAAAkeM/X0NgaFqUM4E/s400/4116981095_1def7e81cd.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gulags were usually located in very\nremote areas of Russia, meaning that even if a prisoner managed to escape, he\nwould probably not reach a populated area and would then die from exposure to\nthe elements. ?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We hear almost nothing\nin the news and the Hollywood and entertainment media about Yagoda and the\nlegion of murderers who killed several times more people than the alleged\nnumbers of Jewish Holocaust. &nbsp;Do you\nthink those victims any less human, their children any less precious?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why is there so little\nmedia about this? &nbsp;Why no Blockbuster\nfilms about the crimes of Yagoda and others? &nbsp;Why no trials and punishment? Why no museums\nand mass media on the Red Terror?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Zionist group that\ndominates Hollywood and the main stream media at large, hides the facts about\nthe leading Jewish role in communism and its crimes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yagoda was ultimately a\nvictim of the Purge himself. &nbsp;He was\ndemoted from the directorship of the NKVD in favor of Nikolai Yezhov in 1936,\nand arrested in 1937. &nbsp;Charged with the\ncrimes of wrecking, espionage, Trotskyism, and conspiracy, Yagoda was found\nguilty and shot. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was replaced as\nchief hangman in 1936 by Yezhov, the \"bloodthirsty Jewish dwarf.\"</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His successor and\nformer deputy Yezhov ordered the guards to strip Yagoda naked and beat him for\nadded humiliation just before his execution. Yagoda tried pleading with Stalin\nthat he had built two canals for him.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yc-ubqGYiVY/Ue161sixRHI/AAAAAAAAkhU/cnKWaB_r40g/s1600/download.jpgcdjhvk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"341\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yc-ubqGYiVY/Ue161sixRHI/AAAAAAAAkhU/cnKWaB_r40g/s400/download.jpgcdjhvk.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indeed Yagoda built two\ncanals for Stalin.&nbsp; As deputy head of the\nGPU, &nbsp;Yagoda organized the building of\nthe White Sea \u2013 Baltic Canal using forced labor from the Gulag system at\nbreakneck speed between 1931 and 1933 at the cost of huge casualties. For his\ncontribution to the canal\u2019s construction he was later awarded the Order of\nLenin. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Q_foBCiSzFo/Ue1fpU21rVI/AAAAAAAAkes/7LXkuKlEj4I/s1600/130.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"449\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Q_foBCiSzFo/Ue1fpU21rVI/AAAAAAAAkes/7LXkuKlEj4I/s400/130.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The construction of the\nMoscow-Volga Canal was also started under his watch but only completed after\nhis fall by his successor Nikolai Yezhov. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3s_4xo1WjW4/Ue1fxLb8CRI/AAAAAAAAke0/Bdo-Q5X5tU4/s1600/article-1371768-00329A4100000190-823_634x370.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"371\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3s_4xo1WjW4/Ue1fxLb8CRI/AAAAAAAAke0/Bdo-Q5X5tU4/s400/article-1371768-00329A4100000190-823_634x370.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than a quarter of a million people were\narrested during the 1934\u20131935 period and the Gulag system was vastly expanded\nunder his stewardship, forced labor becoming a major factor in the Soviet\neconomy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Great Stalin White\nSea Canal. is a ship canal in Russia opened on 2 August 1933. It connects the\nWhite Sea with Lake Onega, which is further connected to the Baltic Sea. Until\n1961, its original name was the Stalin White Sea \u2013 Baltic Sea Canal\n(Belomorsko\u2013Baltiyskiy Kanal imeni Stalina). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lzlhFkj-Gt8/Ue1iQCaXBSI/AAAAAAAAkfU/Bm-0EDwHjTg/s1600/gulag6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"273\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lzlhFkj-Gt8/Ue1iQCaXBSI/AAAAAAAAkfU/Bm-0EDwHjTg/s400/gulag6.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The canal was constructed by forced labour (\ngulag ) inmates. During its construction by a total of 126,000 workers, &nbsp;more than 210, 000 died.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-utz60b68YgQ/Ue1iHkCPoOI/AAAAAAAAkfM/Q35g7M-xuVU/s1600/Gulag-nella-taiga-T-Kizny-500.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"393\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-utz60b68YgQ/Ue1iHkCPoOI/AAAAAAAAkfM/Q35g7M-xuVU/s400/Gulag-nella-taiga-T-Kizny-500.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The total length of the\ncanal is 227 kilometres . Its construction was completed four months ahead of\nschedule. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire canal was\nconstructed in twenty months, between 1931 and 1933, almost entirely by manual\nlabor, using hands and primitive tools . </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EjYKepMzSsk/Ue17vl33z9I/AAAAAAAAkhk/hyQVpozkZuI/s1600/images.jpgfwqt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"214\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EjYKepMzSsk/Ue17vl33z9I/AAAAAAAAkhk/hyQVpozkZuI/s320/images.jpgfwqt.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Above: Stalin inspecting the new canal.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genrikh Yagoda, </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jacob Schiff grew up in\nthe house that the Rothschild's had at 148 Judengasse, Frankfurt. &nbsp;Jacob Schiff came to the United States with\nRothschild capital and took over control of a small jewish banking concern\nfounded by two Cincinnati dry goods merchants Abraham Kuhn and Solomon Loeb. &nbsp;He &nbsp;married Soloman's daughter. In 1885, Loeb\nretired, and Schiff ran the Kuhn, Loeb Co. for Rothschilds until 1920 when he\ndied.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jacob Schiff, was thus\nboss of the Rothschild-owned Kuhn, Loeb and Co and also one of the &nbsp;Rothschild\u2019s agents in America.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How President Wilson\nwas elected in 1912 was one of the all a part of the conspiracy organized by\nJacob Schiff and his New York banking fraternity at the meeting at Jekyll\nIsland in Georgia in 1908.-- The conspirators led by Jacob Schiff enlisted the\nhelp of former President Theodore Roosevelt, a Jewish Republican and convinced\nhim to run on the third party Bull Moose ticket and split the Republican\nvote.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">President Robert Taft, a well\nrespected Republican, was running for re-election in the Presidential election\nscheduled for 1912. The scheme worked and Woodrow Wilson was elected President\nin the 1912 election and when the Federal Reserve Act came to his desk in 1913,\nhe rewarded his bankers and signed the act into law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rothschilds along\nwith Jacob Schiff thus created the major events of the 20th century by\nproviding the key funding for the Bolsheviks, Lenin and Trotsky.&nbsp;&nbsp; The Russian Revolution of 1917 eventually\nled to the domination of Eastern Europe by Communist Russia after World War II,\nthe Korean War, the Vietnam War and all conflicts associated with the Cold\nWar.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Max Moritz Warburg the German\nbanker and agent of Rothschild funded Lenin and his revolutionaries. Jacob\nSchiff gave a known $20 million to Lenin. &nbsp;J.P. Morgan &amp; Co. another agent of\nRothschild also financed the Bolshevik revolution. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Lenin was a student\nof &nbsp;Jew Karl Marx. He thirsted for\nrevenge as his elder &nbsp;brother, Alexander,\nwas hung in 1887 along with four comrades for conspiring to assassinate Czar\nAlexander II, the grandfather of Nicholas II. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uMKQqTIIklQ/Ue2Qap1GHGI/AAAAAAAAkjU/xUvie2tj92o/s1600/marx_2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uMKQqTIIklQ/Ue2Qap1GHGI/AAAAAAAAkjU/xUvie2tj92o/s400/marx_2.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1903, in London, he\ninitiated a split in the Russian Social-Democratic Workers Party, which was\ncompleted in 1912, and became known as the All Russian Communist Party in 1918.\nHis left-wing faction became known as the Bolsheviks, or\n\"bolshinstvo,\" which meant \"majority\" (the Menshevicks, or\n\"menshinstvo,\" meant \"minority\"). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The movement was slow to catch on, and by\n1907, he only had 17 members, but he would soon have over 40,000\u2014such was the\npower of Rothschild\u2019s money.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> Leon Trotsky</span></b> was\nexiled from Russia because of his part in the aborted revolution in 1905 and\nwas a reporter for Novy Mir, a communist paper in New York, from 1916-17. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-evN3yIC1G9w/Ue2QQwlZiKI/AAAAAAAAkjM/o6_bjEAIJnk/s1600/download.jpgtrot.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-evN3yIC1G9w/Ue2QQwlZiKI/AAAAAAAAkjM/o6_bjEAIJnk/s320/download.jpgtrot.jpg\" width=\"232\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had an expensive apartment and traveled\naround town in a chauffeur-driven limousine. He sometimes stayed at the Krupp mansion,\nand had been seen going in and out of Schiff's New York mansion. Leon Trotsky\nwas given $20 million in Jacob Schiff gold<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the assassination\nof Tsar Alexander II in 1881, there was a wave of pogroms in Russia against the\nJewish community. This led to a large increase in Jews leaving Russia. &nbsp;Of these, more than 90 per cent settled in the\nUnited States -- all moaning and complaining to one and all about how cruely\nand unfairly the Jews in Russia were being treated. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They would never\nmention that the Jews &nbsp;had agitated for\nrevolution in 1848, or that they had assassinated the Tsar in 1881, or of\ncourse, that they would agitate for another revolution in 1905 and finally\nsuceed in subjugating Russia in 1917. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nope,\nthat part of history was uninteresting and unimportant. \"All The News That\nWas Fit To Print\" was already being given to America through America's\nPravda, The New York Times and Rothschild held media. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hands of Jewish\nPharisees were always clean\u2014till the internet age.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After murdering the\nTsar and his family in cold blood on 17<sup>th</sup> July 1918, the head of the\nCommunist secret police Jew Moisei Uritsky, would ignite the Red Terror of\nSept- Oct of 1918, as ordered by Jew Yakov Sverdlov, who was also the man\nresponsible for ordering the extermination of the entire Romanov family in cold\nblood. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indeed, under a law\nintroduced by Tsar Alexander III following the assassination of his father, Tsar\nAlexander II &nbsp;( murdered by Jewish terrorist\norganization Narodnaya Volya &nbsp;on 13<sup>th</sup>\nMarch 1881 ) &nbsp;all Russian Jews were\nforced to live in what became known as the Pale of Jewish Settlement. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Exceptions were made\nfor rich business people, students and for certain professions. The Pale\ncomprised the ten Polish and fifteen neighbouring Russian provinces, stretching\nfrom Riga to Odessa, from Silesia to Vilna and Kiev. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tsar Nicholas I was\nhated by the Jews as he would not allow them to escape compulsory military duty\nas Alexander I had done by just paying a tax.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Tsar Alexander II</b> </span>was murdered\nwith a bomb in&nbsp;1881, by the very Jews that he had given\nfreedom to.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shortly after the\nOctober Revolution in 1917, some Russian patriots took to the arms and stood up\nto the murderous Jew, &nbsp;but utilizing\nunlimited financial resources made available by Rothschild the Jews were able\nto crush the brave Russians and punish them severely.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild snatched\naway the enormous wealth of the Tsars . After the communist rule was established,\nthe entire wealth of the common Russian people were vacuumed off . &nbsp;Under Communist rule no private property was\nallowed. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The base of Rothschild\u2019s\ntrillions of dollars wealth is however gold from the Kerala temples. &nbsp;&nbsp;Rothschild\u2019s\nallowed Tipu Sultan to make a pile of this gold at Srirangapatnam by doing all\nthe sweaty dirty work of destroying the temples , like the Queen Bee gathering honey. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then in one foul swoop they carted away\nthe gold earned by millenniums of spice trade, &nbsp;to their underground gold cellars in Germany.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Jewish run Gulag is\nrecognized as a major instrument of political repression in the Soviet Union.\nThe German concentration camps of Hitler were picnic camps in comparison.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GULag is the acronym\nfor Chief Administration of Corrective Labor Camps and Colonies . The Gulag labour\ncamps were dissolved on January 13, 1960. The first labor camps, were\nestablished right after the Red revolution, in 1918.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn,\nwinner of the 1970 Nobel Prize in Literature, introduced the term to the Western\nworld with the publication of The Gulag Archipelago in 1973. He explained how the\nGulag was a evil system where people were worked to death. &nbsp;In March 1940, there were 53 separate camps and\n423 labor colonies in the USSR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">About 14 million people\nwere in the Gulag \"labor camps\" from 1929 to 1953. A further 6-7\nmillion were deported and exiled to remote areas of the USSR, and 4-5 million\npassed through \"labor colonies. It was common practice to release\nprisoners who were either suffering from incurable diseases or just on the\npoint of death, or if they were totally crippled.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">The estimates for total\nnumber deaths in the Gulag is in tens of millions. You will never know the exact figure as the world media is Jew&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">monopolized</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Simple jokes about the Jewish\n&nbsp;Soviet government officials who lived\ncomfortable in dachas &nbsp;were punishable by\nimprisonment.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the &nbsp;political\nprisoners in the Gulag camps were imprisoned without trial. The GULAG was\nreduced in size following Stalin\u2019s death in 1953.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Russian prisoners once\ncalled the \"meat-grinder\": the arrests, the interrogations, the\ntransport in unheated cattle cars, the forced labor, the destruction of\nfamilies, the years spent in exile, the early and unnecessary deaths.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The official term,\n\"corrective labor camp\", was suggested for official politburo of the\nCommunist Party of the Soviet Union use in the session of July 27, 1929.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During 1920-50, the Jewsih\nleaders of the Communist Party and Soviet state considered repressions as a\ntool for securing the normal functioning of the state system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gulag was invented\nto isolate &nbsp;suspicious, anti-semitic or &nbsp;disloyal elements whose thoughts were not\ncontributing to the strengthening of the dictatorship of the proletariat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gulag quickly became a\nsource of cheap labor force where workers had NO rights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two birds with one\nsingle stone, the Gulag possessed both punitive and economic functions.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IgjYbyauqfI/Ue4TvfLOwTI/AAAAAAAAklA/h6mTB7E2g34/s1600/images.jpgyfuibnu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"290\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IgjYbyauqfI/Ue4TvfLOwTI/AAAAAAAAklA/h6mTB7E2g34/s400/images.jpgyfuibnu.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to complete\nall of their projects, camp administrators moved prisoners from project to\nproject. The Jew commisars pushed the Gulag to \u201cdo more with less. The NKVD\nemployed a system of setting unrealistically high production goals, straining\nresources in an attempt to encourage higher productivity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Due to the speed of\nOperation Barbarossa\u2019s advance, not all laborers could be evacuated in time,\nand many were massacred by the NKVD to prevent the vengeful inmates &nbsp;from switching allegiance to Hitler. When the\ntide of the war turned however, and the Soviets pushed the Germans back, the\ncamps were replenished with fresh laborers\u2014pulled in on flimsy reasons without\ntrial.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DxegI4Y0jRc/Ue4T7fHTMxI/AAAAAAAAklI/kQR8SXwDNq0/s1600/shutterstock_97715387.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"285\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DxegI4Y0jRc/Ue4T7fHTMxI/AAAAAAAAklI/kQR8SXwDNq0/s400/shutterstock_97715387.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the Red Army\nrecaptured territories from the Germans, an influx of POW\u2019s greatly increased\nthe Gulag population<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After World War II the\nnumber of inmates in prison camps and colonies, again, rose sharply, reaching\napproximately 4 million people by the early 1950s <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The amnesty in March\n1953 was limited to non-political prisoners and for political prisoners\nsentenced to not more than 5 years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Officially the Gulag\nwas liquidated by the MVD order No 020 of 25 January 1960.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\">A big percentage of the\nprisoners had deteriorated to the point of losing any resemblance to human\nbeings. &nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kUTmX3LaZbQ/Ue4Rvt_VXsI/AAAAAAAAkjs/pnfuMZzGOrY/s1600/images.jpggrwhwh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"253\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kUTmX3LaZbQ/Ue4Rvt_VXsI/AAAAAAAAkjs/pnfuMZzGOrY/s400/images.jpggrwhwh.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\">Lacking food . . . these lice\nridden and maggot prisoners collect garbage and ate rats, cockroaches&nbsp;and made soup of maggots from their own bodies and from dead bodies..</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sBsk6JE7A54/Ue4Rhjd3i-I/AAAAAAAAkjk/OOPBir5i41Y/s1600/images.jpgvgweh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sBsk6JE7A54/Ue4Rhjd3i-I/AAAAAAAAkjk/OOPBir5i41Y/s1600/images.jpgvgweh.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Siberian camps, devoted\neither to gold-mining or timber harvesting, &nbsp;inflicted the greatest toll in the Gulag\nsystem and were actually &nbsp;extermination\ncentres.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AK_k3TWeWZE/Ue4Tga7vvRI/AAAAAAAAkkw/462YvcE5Y5U/s1600/images.jpgcewge.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"301\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AK_k3TWeWZE/Ue4Tga7vvRI/AAAAAAAAkkw/462YvcE5Y5U/s400/images.jpgcewge.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the Kolyma\ngold-fields, where \u201coutside work for prisoners was compulsory until the\ntemperature reached \u221250 deg Centigrade and the death rate among miners in the\ngoldfields was estimated at about 60 per cent per annum.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Locals who captured a\nrunaway were given rewards. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vPs_DFikvSY/Ue4TYkz6SNI/AAAAAAAAkko/eW7sFsYBeeE/s1600/11_6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"235\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vPs_DFikvSY/Ue4TYkz6SNI/AAAAAAAAkko/eW7sFsYBeeE/s400/11_6.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gulags in colder areas not\nbothered with finding escaped prisoners as they would die anyhow from the cold\nand severe winters. &nbsp;Every prisoners who\ndid escape without getting shot were often found dead miles away from the camp.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At least they died free.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-c3grm17jRMc/Ue4Tooqoa_I/AAAAAAAAkk4/ItytkC2E_Vg/s1600/images.jpgyguvfbui.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"197\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-c3grm17jRMc/Ue4Tooqoa_I/AAAAAAAAkk4/ItytkC2E_Vg/s400/images.jpgyguvfbui.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Escape was deterred by human\nmeat eating &nbsp;tracking dogs that were\nassigned to each camp. If a prisoner escaped under a guard's watch, the guard\nwould often be stripped of his uniform and become a Gulag inmate himself.\nFurther, if an escaping prisoner was shot, guards could be fined amounts that\nwere often equivalent to one or two weeks wages.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-igccXZql1lo/Ue4TS91pcOI/AAAAAAAAkkg/e69rXliCvOs/s1600/wk2_GULAG_moving_out_AA_01_01a.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-igccXZql1lo/Ue4TS91pcOI/AAAAAAAAkkg/e69rXliCvOs/s400/wk2_GULAG_moving_out_AA_01_01a.jpg\" width=\"312\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The area along the\nIndigirka river was known as the Gulag inside the Gulag. In 1926, the Oimiakon &nbsp;village in this region registered the record\nlow temperature of \u221271.2 \u00b0C (\u221296 \u00b0F). With howling winds, you get frostbite in\nan instant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-b5SQNRBibPY/Ue4SGhprljI/AAAAAAAAkj8/iRzrhX0JrM0/s1600/deadguyatgulag2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"290\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-b5SQNRBibPY/Ue4SGhprljI/AAAAAAAAkj8/iRzrhX0JrM0/s400/deadguyatgulag2.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under the supervision\nof Lavrenty Beria who headed both NKVD and the Soviet Atom bomb program until\nhis demise in 1953, thousands of zeks were used to mine uranium ore and prepare\ntest facilities on Novaya Zemlya, Vaygach Island, Semipalatinsk, among other\nsites.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Throughout the history\nof the Soviet Union, at least 476 separate camp administrations existed.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TrJM8oHVZHc/Ue4TMOfCsII/AAAAAAAAkkY/akR4fmcaKvQ/s1600/images.jpguguohj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TrJM8oHVZHc/Ue4TMOfCsII/AAAAAAAAkkY/akR4fmcaKvQ/s400/images.jpguguohj.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aleksandr\nSolzhenitsyn's book The Gulag Archipelago was not the first literary work about\nlabor camps. His previous book on the subject, \"One Day in the Life of\nIvan Denisovich\", about a typical day of the Gulag inmate, was originally\npublished in the most prestigious Soviet monthly, Novy Mir, (New World), in\nNovember 1962, but was soon banned by the Jews and withdrawn from all libraries.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aBFObyl_WZ4/Ue4SU1k5oCI/AAAAAAAAkkM/E6FHK2beZaE/s1600/solzhenitsyn_big.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aBFObyl_WZ4/Ue4SU1k5oCI/AAAAAAAAkkM/E6FHK2beZaE/s400/solzhenitsyn_big.jpg\" width=\"285\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soviet state documents\nshow that the goals of the gulag included colonization of sparsely populated\nremote areas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jTSE19mK-UY/Ue4SBZlL9tI/AAAAAAAAkj0/q2dIVibMe0g/s1600/5-HARSH-GULAG-CONDITIONS.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"237\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jTSE19mK-UY/Ue4SBZlL9tI/AAAAAAAAkj0/q2dIVibMe0g/s400/5-HARSH-GULAG-CONDITIONS.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When obedient had\nserved the majority of their terms, they could be released for \"free\nsettlement\" outside the confinement of the camp. They were known as\n\"free settlers\".&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any concealment of a\nprevious imprisonment was a triable offence.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-d9qvUhrKXhE/Ue4SL8qEhDI/AAAAAAAAkkE/3lqxmjtQCNQ/s1600/ColorBlind300.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
