font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our man Yezhov was not\nJewish but he married a very promiscuous and sexually active Jewish woman, as a flimsy insurance\npolicy. .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was Stalin's </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">grand inquisitor and official extractor\nof</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">confessions, who succeeded Yagoda. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Yagoda was but the first of thousands to die by\nYezhov's orders</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nikolai Ivanovich\nYezhov ( or Ezhov ) &nbsp;was the chairman of the\nSoviet secret police NKVD who conducted Great Purge in the 1930s under Joseph\nStalin. .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under Yezhov, the Great\nPurge reached its height during 1937\u20131938, with more than 70% &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">of the members of the Supreme Soviet and\nofficers of the Soviet military being stripped of their positions and\nimprisoned, exiled to the Siberian gulags or executed without trials . Reason?\nLack of loyalty ( hand kissing ) , snitching, enemy of state etc. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">And Stalin had his arbitrary quotas for\narrests and executions every week.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Earlier in 1938, Yezhov\nhad even ordered the arrest of higher ranking Beria, who was Communist party\nchief in Georgia. &nbsp;However, Georgian NKVD\nchief, Sergei Goglidze, warned Beria, who immediately flew to Moscow to see\nStalin personally. &nbsp;Beria convinced\nStalin to spare his life and reminded Stalin of his past loyalty and services.\nStalin loved to get such ego massages by hand kissing regularly .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In an ironic twist of\nfate, it would be Yezhov who would eventually fall in the struggle for power,\nand Beria who would become the new NKVD chief.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On November 14, Yezov\nmade a huge mistake . He pre-warned his chamchas ( protege ) , &nbsp;Ukrainian NKVD chief &nbsp;that he was in trouble with Stalin,, who\npromptly went missing. Stalin was furious and he knew for sure who had spilt\nthe beans. beria caught the guy&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">on April 14, 1939</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stalin had called Beria to\narrest the missing fugitive \u2013 when he should have told Yezov as per protocol.\nYezov now knew that his time was up, and he was NOT even a fellow Jew.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Yezov&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">arm twisted his wife\nto write a <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KOSHER</span></b> letter to Stalin, Jew to Jew. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When she was reluctant, he threatened to\ndivorce her. She panicked and wrote several letters to Stalin , who just\nignored her. On November 19, his wife Evgenia committed suicide by taking an\noverdose of sleeping pills; she was particularly vulnerable because Stalin knew\nof her active sexual life and her many Jewish lovers, and people close to her\nwere being arrested for months .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">What poetic justice!&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">After presiding over mass arrests and executions\nduring the Great Purge, Yezhov became its victim.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On April 10, he was\narrested and imprisoned at the Sukhanovka prison; the \"arrest was\npainstakingly concealed, not only from the general public but also from all &nbsp;NKVD officers... It would not do any good to make\npublic that Stalin would execute his dearest and most loyal minion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yezhov was mercilessly tortured\nunder Beria\u2019s orders . He confessed to every single charge made against him ,\nincluding theft, treason against the state, incompetence, being an enemy to the\npeople \u2014 like the good Vatican Inquisitions\u2014without a shred of evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yezhov, like his\npredecessor Yagoda, maintained to the end his endless love for Stalin. He cried\nthat he would die with the name of Stalin on his lips. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After\nthe secret trial, Yezhov was allowed to return to his cell but half an hour\nlater he was called back and told that he had been condemned to death. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On hearing the verdict, Yezhov became faint\nand began to collapse, but the guards caught him and removed him from the room.\nAn immediate appeal for clemency was declined, and Yezhov became hysterical and\nweeping.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This time he had to be dragged out of the room, struggling with the\nguards and screaming. Yezhov was shot later that night in an execution chamber\nwith sloping floor ( to drain the blood ) &nbsp;for hosing that had been built according to his own\nspecifications near the Lubianka headquarters.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just before the\nexecution, Stalin hand kisser , Yezhov was ordered to undress himself and then was brutally beaten and\nhis testicles injured by guards at the order of Beria, the new NKVD chief, &nbsp;exactly the same way s Yezhov had ordered his guards\nto beat and humiliate his predecessor Yagoda before his execution only two\nyears before.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vbCGx4Ycc9A/Ue_AVvkk44I/AAAAAAAAkpo/iM4LwZfr3Fs/s1600/180px-Nikolai_Yezhov_conferring_with_Stalin.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vbCGx4Ycc9A/Ue_AVvkk44I/AAAAAAAAkpo/iM4LwZfr3Fs/s320/180px-Nikolai_Yezhov_conferring_with_Stalin.jpg\" width=\"292\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On February 4, he was\nexecuted by the future KGB chairman Ivan Serov . His body was immediately\ncremated and his ashes dumped in a common grave at Moscow's Donskoi Cemetery.\nThe execution remained secret, and as late as 1948.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild controlled Time\nreported that Yezov had gone mad and was in an insane asylum. &nbsp;Imagine this man nicknamed as \"the blood thirty dwarf\" wore the ORDER OF LENIN on his uniform.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8oMPxqb5-ek/Ue-_ggk0J5I/AAAAAAAAkpY/ICwL7WkoOUU/s1600/vrh67o78.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Enter sexual pervert and <span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">SNUFF expert </span>Jew Lavrentiy\nPavlovich Beria-- who did NOT even spare Stalin's daughter.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Shas. 2:2<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u25cf Yebhamoth 55b:&nbsp;</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1PdziU9gGn0/Ue_q0bs9wgI/AAAAAAAAkqI/bcgUrX0q48E/s1600/vdhtyk7y.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"275\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1PdziU9gGn0/Ue_q0bs9wgI/AAAAAAAAkqI/bcgUrX0q48E/s320/vdhtyk7y.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZoXyLzRcHAo/Ue_HJ4K5woI/AAAAAAAAkp4/tb5SyAf0Nes/s1600/300px-Lavrenti_Beria_Stalins_family.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"314\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZoXyLzRcHAo/Ue_HJ4K5woI/AAAAAAAAkp4/tb5SyAf0Nes/s400/300px-Lavrenti_Beria_Stalins_family.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He made an ass out of Stalin in 1930 by\nfaking a conspiracy to assassinate the Soviet leader using his won stooges and\nthen making a great show of saving Stalin at a great personal risk.&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eight naked under aged\ngirls would be made to kneel with asses up and heads touching the floor on the\n8 quadrants of the compass. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beria would steal up from behind in his robe, &nbsp;walking round and round till he selected the\nbest bottom. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then he would stick a flower into the girl and\nhave her dragged into his sound proof room, where he would ravage her.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the 1970s bones\nhave been found in the back yard, cellars, or hidden inside the walls of\nBeria's former residence, currently the Tunisian Embassy. &nbsp;&nbsp;Beria kept a special room adjacent to his\noffice for the torturing and raping of small children. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After his arrest upon the death of Stalin\nwhen his office desk was searched they found a large collection of various sex\ntoys and used unwashed female undergarments. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ediY8T3mm8I/UfI0aKBgUAI/AAAAAAAAksI/kS89NtB8UCM/s1600/images.jpgberia.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The true number of victims will probably never\nbe known, &nbsp;but over 100 women had come\nforward over the years to say that they had been victimized. &nbsp;Nobody knows the actual number he had\npersonally murdered. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Starting in 1938, Beria\nbegan a project rebuilding a monastery in the Moscow suburbs. When Sukhanovo\n(also known as Special Object No. 110) was completed, he would maintain a\npersonal office there. The lower levels of Sukhanovo housed a complex of prison\ncells and torture chambers, and Beria was said to have personally witnessed\nmany brutal interrogations at Sukhanovo.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the Sukhanovo prisoners were\nas high ranking as Red Army generals, many of whom would be held there for\nextended periods of time before facing trial.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yditMeTjWno/UfAXv5sdfCI/AAAAAAAAkqY/pd6wONttq7U/s1600/lavrentiy-beria_2-t.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yditMeTjWno/UfAXv5sdfCI/AAAAAAAAkqY/pd6wONttq7U/s400/lavrentiy-beria_2-t.jpg\" width=\"313\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beria was noted for having his\nbodyguards kidnap young schoolgirls so that he could rape them in his Lubyanka\noffice, which doubled as a torture chamber. &nbsp;Soviet leaders who had daughters were reported\nto have demanded them to be careful with Beria, as he had a magnetic way with\nthem, though his complexion was yellowish green. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once Stalin learnt that his daughter Svetlana\nwas alone with Beria at his house. &nbsp;He\nsaid, \"I don't trust Beria,\" and called her to tell her to leave\nimmediately. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Beria complimented\nAlexander Poskrebyshev's attractive young daughter on her beauty, Poskrebyshev quickly pulled\nher aside and instructed her, \"Don't ever accept a lift from Beria\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Can you believe this?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This man secured for himself\nFive Orders of Lenin (1935, 1943, 1945 and 1949).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To give the devil his\ndue he was a go getter , and he could squeeze oil out of rock and get the\nimpossible done , by his harsh methods. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shortly after the\natomic bombings of Japan by the US in 1945, Stalin issued an ultimatum to\nBeria, ordering the A-bomb to be built within five years. A special department\nwas set up at the NKVD, called \u201cDepartment S\u201d (also known as Bureau #2) to\nconsolidate the research efforts and organize documents gathered about the U.S.\nA-bomb project through intelligence channels. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a result, the bomb\nwas ready within four years !!!. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This extraordinary\nsuccess was achieved at a high price. Beria created a climate of total secrecy\nand immense fear within the project. &nbsp;The\nintrigue was so thick that you could cut it with a knife. Every scientist &nbsp;was under constant surveillance at all times..\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The head of one of the\ndepartments was sentenced to 8 years in prison for reportedly boasting to his\nfamily about the work being conducted. Another scientist &nbsp;choosing to avoid the Gulag&nbsp; after misplacing several papers committed\nsuicide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Stalin used Beria to stage his purges. In 1938\nhe was put in charge of the dreaded NKVD. &nbsp;Beria was responsible for the infamous Katyn\nmassacre of captive Polish soldiers and intellectuals. Beria was also in charge\nof the Gulag prison system that sent millions to oblivion. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beria administered the\nvast expansion of the Gulag labor camps. The gulags existed before Beria, but\nhe was the one who built them on a mass scale. He industrialised the gulag\nsystem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human life had no value for him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beria was Marshal of\nthe Soviet Union and state security administrator, chief of the Soviet security\nand secret police apparatus (NKVD) under Joseph Stalin during World War II, and\nDeputy Premier in the postwar years (1946\u201353). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beria was the longest\nlived and most influential of Stalin's secret police chiefs, wielding his most\nsubstantial influence during and after World War II.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beria ruthlessly\nblackmailed officials in order to gain political backing and promotions. He\nwould often set up his superiors with attractive married women (with hidden\ncameras) and under aged girls&nbsp; and then\nexposed the affairs, ruining them and then taking their posts when they\nresigned in disgrace.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He wasn\u2019t just vicious in his career ambitions either \u2013\nwherever he went, people died or were reported missing. In 1931 Beria first met\nJoseph Stalin while the latter was on vacation in Georgia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 15 years as head of\nthe secret police, the NKVD, Beria &nbsp;was\nresponsible for overseeing the murder of millions of Russians, some shot at\nnight in the depths of the Lubyanka, others dragged off to the gulags.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stalin was poisoned by\nBeria's associates. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 1 Mar 1953,\nStalin and Beria had dinner together along with other Soviet leaders; that\nevening, Stalin collapsed, dying four days later.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soon after Stalin\u2019s\ndeath in March 1953, Beria became one of four deputy prime ministers under\nGeorgy M. Malenkov, as well as head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, an\norganization which at that time combined both the secret and regular police\nfunctions. &nbsp;Rothschild supported Beria\napparently attempted to use his position as chief of the secret police to\nsucceed Stalin as sole dictator. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But Nikita Khrushev who\nwas NOT a Jew and had seen how the Communist party and his country had been\nhijacked by Rothschild remote controlled Jews had other ideas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 26 June 1953, Beria\nwas arrested and held in an undisclosed location near Moscow. Khrushchev\nprepared an elaborate ambush, convening a meeting of the Presidium on 26 June,\nwhere he suddenly launched a scathing attack on Beria, accusing him of being a\ntraitor and spy in the pay of British intelligence. Beria was taken completely\nby surprise.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He asked, \"What's going on, Nikita ? Why are you picking\nfleas in my trousers?\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Molotov and others\nquickly spoke against Beria one after the other, followed by a motion by\nKhrushchev for his instant dismissal. When Beria finally realized what was\nhappening and plaintively appealed to Malenkov to speak for him, his old friend\nand crony silently hung his head and refused to meet his gaze. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malenkov pressed a\nbutton on his desk as the pre-arranged signal to Marshal Georgy Zhukov and a\ngroup of armed officers in a nearby room. They burst in and arrested Beria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was stripped &nbsp;of his government and party posts, publicly\naccused of being an \u201cimperialist (Rothschild) agent\u201d and of conducting \u201ccriminal\nanti-party and anti-state activities.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beria was found guilty\nof treason, terrorism, and counter-revolutionary activities during the 1919\ncivil war. He was executed by a firing squad in Dec 1953.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For decades after he\nwas shot, any mention of Beria was expunged from official Soviet histories.\nUnlike Stalin, who was buried in Lenin's Mausoleum and later moved to a grave\nby the Kremlin walls, his body was burnt and his ashes dispersed into the winds\nby a huge fan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With Stalin\u2019s and Beria\u2019s\ndeath, power shifted from Rothschild controlled Jews to the Russian people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">HOW MANY OF YOU KNOW\nTHAT LIKE KARL MARX , STALIN HAS ROTHSCHILD BLOOD IN HIM ?</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Her0P8evvCw/UfEdgoh6poI/AAAAAAAAkqo/2emELB1_Hp0/s1600/joseph-stalin_14-t.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stalin was the spitting\nimage of&nbsp; <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Maurice Ephrussi ( above )&nbsp;</span></b>, the banker son-in-law\nof French Baron Alphonse de Rothschild . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everybody\nin Georgi knows this. I was told by my Georgian shipmates.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Talking about </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>splitting\nimages</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">, a Filipino officer sailed with me.&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>One day during his bridge watch at\nnight, he told me his story about how he divorced his wife. His was a shotgun\nmarriage. Her father ( a top police officer ) put a gun on his head for his daughter\nwas made pregnant by him . &nbsp;He married\nher and as soon as his son was born, he abandoned his wife , claiming that it\nis NOT his child.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>So I asked him , how he was so sure. He said that he did the\ncalculations. &nbsp;So later after his watch ,\nI called him down to my cabin , took some data oit of his hindsight , did some calculations\nmyself, and said that the child was his . Then I advised him to go and see his\n18 year old son as soon as he gets down on leave.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Couple of years later when my\nship went to Manila, this officer came on my ship, and showed me the picture of\nhis young strapping son , and his own photo when he was of the same age \u2014 AN\nEXACT SPLITTING IMAGE . &nbsp;He was a\nhandsome guy himself.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>He had reconciled with\nhis college going son, &nbsp;and they both\nloved each other-- bygones be bygones. The mother did NOT marry again.</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>And then he took me\nall over Manila in his SUV. &nbsp;</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I remember\nvisiting UNIVERSAL where there were at least 80 nude girls on stage , ( they\ncome on in batches of 8 ) none of them older than 20 \u2014never seen anything like\nthis before.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ephrussi's were\nthe Rothschild's agent to the Tsar of Russia. At the time of Stalin\u2019s\nconception (Feb. 1878), his mother, Ketevan \u201cKeke\u201d Jughashvili ne\u00e9 Geladze\n(February 5, 1858 \u2013 June 4, 1937), was a VERY attractive girl. &nbsp;She worked for a Jewish wine merchant in the\nGeorgian city of Gori.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: lime;\">Stalin whose father was Rothschild , was catapulted\nto fame by Rothschild exactly like Winston Churchill, whose mother Jenny Jerome\nwas Rothschild. &nbsp;</b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Winston Churchill was\ncatapulted from a Mr. Nobody to the \"most famous Englishman \" and to\nthe world stage by mind boggling deceit-- the way Rothschild always did. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Patriot Stalin</b> </span>,\norganized a strike and set fire to the refinery \u2013 in hold your breath\u2014 his first\nday of employment under Jew Rothschild.&nbsp; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of her brothers,\nYakov, was captured by the Nazis, &nbsp;who\noffered to exchange him for a top German general. &nbsp;Stalin refused, saying that he will not exchange\nan ordinary soldier for a General and Yakov was killed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This time, however, she had her way. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sverdlov &nbsp;was a Bolshevik party leader\nand chairman of the All-Russian Central Executive Committee.. &nbsp;His father was a politically active engraver\nwho later became an ace forger.&nbsp; Sverdlov\nplayed an important role in planning the October Revolution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sverdlov had a major role\nin the killing of Tsar Nicholas II and his family. &nbsp;Sverdlov ordered their execution on 16 July\n1918, which took place in the city of Yekaterinbur<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To prevent the Russians from deriving\nspiritual courage from the grave of the Tsar family,, the bodies were removed\nto the countryside, where they had initially been thrown into an abandoned\nmineshaft.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The following morning, when rumours spread in Yekaterinburg regarding\nthe disposal site, Yurovsky removed the bodies and concealed them elsewhere.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the vehicle carrying the bodies broke down on the way to the next chosen\nsite, he made new arrangements and buried most of the bodies in a sealed and\nconcealed pit on Koptyaki Road, a since-abandoned cart track 12 miles north of\nYekaterinburg.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For 90 years, it has\nbeen an enduring mystery - did some members of the Russian royal family survive\nexecution by the Bolsheviks in 1918?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now DNA tests carried\nout on two sets of bones found in the Ural Mountains appear to have solved the\nriddle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u201cWe stand for organized terror \u2026 Terror is an\nabsolute necessity during times of revolution \u2026 The Cheka is obliged to defend\nthe revolution and conquer the enemy even if its sword does by chance sometimes\nfall on the heads of the innocent.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n\u2014\u2014\u2014&nbsp; <b><i>Felix Edmondovich Dzerzhinsky,\nthe Founder of the Bolshevik \u2018Cheka\u2019 \u2013 or \u201cSecret Police\u201d.<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
