, serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>During the entire Red\nTerror, not a single Jewish synagogue was destroyed or turned into a public toilet or\nstorehouse, as happened to churches. &nbsp;Not\na single rabbi was crucified or tortured. &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--iI5L2W2Rm4/UfJD9SLKWVI/AAAAAAAAkss/ZJQQDPGz2Po/s1600/hyurt6u.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"234\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--iI5L2W2Rm4/UfJD9SLKWVI/AAAAAAAAkss/ZJQQDPGz2Po/s400/hyurt6u.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lists of those executed were published in the\nCheka\u2019s weekly newspaper. &nbsp;The Cheka\nemployed professional body counters. &nbsp;&nbsp;It can be proved that 1.7 million were executed\nfrom 1918-1919. &nbsp;Another 1.7 million were\nmurdered from January 1921 to April 1922. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among the victims were bishops, professors,\ndoctors, police, journalists, writers, military officers, workers, civil\nservants, nurses, farmers, and lawyers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without most of their leaders, and the\nfact that the few left had no way to spread their ideas (no media access), the\nRussian masses were incapable of counter-revolution against the juggernaut zionist\ncommunists.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/j68jmNeJUwM/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/j68jmNeJUwM&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/j68jmNeJUwM&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Enter Jew Yakov\nMikhailovich Yurovsky\u2014 </span>commander secret police.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yurosvky, was an Old\nBolshevik best known as the chief executioner of Emperor Nicholas II of Russia\nand &nbsp;his family.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the night of 16/17\nJuly 1918, a squad of Bolshevik secret police (Cheka), led by Yakov Yurovsky,\nexecuted Russia's last Emperor, Nicholas II, along with his wife Alexandra\nFyodorovna of Hesse, their four daughters\u2013Olga, Tatiana, Maria, and Anastasia\u2013and\nson Alexei.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ij8O2dVNJ4c/UfJhNNmGsnI/AAAAAAAAkuM/5Trf2WbkXtw/s1600/drama_picture_3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"150\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ij8O2dVNJ4c/UfJhNNmGsnI/AAAAAAAAkuM/5Trf2WbkXtw/s320/drama_picture_3.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Orders came from Jew Yakov Sverdlov in Moscow , who in turn was initiated\nby Jew Lenin himself. &nbsp;When the daughters\ndid NOT die as they had big diamonds sewn into their petticoats, the soldiers\nbecame superstitious and afraid. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AXTU4c54RIU/UfJgjhDcgPI/AAAAAAAAkuE/pxtbTy_fUfw/s1600/romanowroomkilled.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AXTU4c54RIU/UfJgjhDcgPI/AAAAAAAAkuE/pxtbTy_fUfw/s400/romanowroomkilled.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Jew Yurosvsky then , ordered\nthe angel looking girls to be&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">bayoneted</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; to death . &nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HshiJsljr68/UfJga5HeG9I/AAAAAAAAkt8/arzeEV6IYwk/s1600/Drama_Picture_02.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HshiJsljr68/UfJga5HeG9I/AAAAAAAAkt8/arzeEV6IYwk/s400/Drama_Picture_02.jpg\" width=\"353\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ipatyev house, where, in the basement, the\nmassacre had occurred, stood intact until 1977, when the local Communist party\nboss at that time, Boris Boris Nikolayevich Yeltsin ( crypto Jew Jelzman ) ,\nordered it demolished, lest it become a shrine to anti-Jewish sentiment. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7Q9FBaXSNUI/UfJerEwoNdI/AAAAAAAAkts/5Ulu0IoUk4Q/s1600/nw_yeltsin_042707.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"287\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7Q9FBaXSNUI/UfJerEwoNdI/AAAAAAAAkts/5Ulu0IoUk4Q/s400/nw_yeltsin_042707.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"While\nGorbachev made freedom of emigration a reality for Soviet Jews, it was Yeltsin\nwho made possible an unprecedented freedom of Jewish life in the country.&nbsp; Jewish schools and new synagogues were opened\n-- it was he who made the impossible possible.\"</span></i> <b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Borukh Gorin, spokesman for the\nFederations of Jewish Communities<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Enter Jew Matvei\nDavidovich Berman\u2014</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-a9tDnOxvj_A/UfKrJLJNn1I/AAAAAAAAkuc/21yftZW0zFI/s1600/144_02A.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-a9tDnOxvj_A/UfKrJLJNn1I/AAAAAAAAkuc/21yftZW0zFI/s400/144_02A.jpg\" width=\"224\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He headed the &nbsp;the GULAG Soviet prison camp system from 1932\nto 1937.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In November 1929 he\nhelped develop the GULAG system of camps and became deputy chief of the GULAG\nin 1930. From June 9, 1932 to August 17, 1937 he was head of the GULAG.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was awarded the\nOrder of Lenin on August 4, 1933, soon after the completion of the White Sea \u2013\nBaltic Canal. By 1935, by his own count, Berman was in charge of over 740,000\nprisoners working on 15 major projects in the GULAG<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the fall of\nGenrikh Yagoda, Berman continued to rise in the hierarchy of the NKVD and he\nheld the offices of head construction of the Moscow-Volga Canal and Deputy head\nof the NKVD in 1936-1937<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On August 17, 1937, he\nlost his position as head of the GULAG. On December 23, 1938, he was expelled\nfrom the Soviet Communist Party, arrested the next day in the office of Georgi\nMalenkov, and sent to prison at Lubyanka. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-B10tsCXAgp8/UfKwIKDYQhI/AAAAAAAAkws/o-ofP51P6F8/s1600/5241237.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"302\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-B10tsCXAgp8/UfKwIKDYQhI/AAAAAAAAkws/o-ofP51P6F8/s400/5241237.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was found guilty by\nthe Military Collegium of the Supreme Court of the USSR of belonging to a\n\"terrorist and sabotage organization\" and shot on March 7, 1939 at\nKommunarka.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dead men tell no tales.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Solzhenitsyn described\nthem as \u2018six hired murderers each of whom accounted for thirty thousand lives:\nFirin - Berman - Frenkel - Kogan - Rappoport - Zhuk ... Thousands of Jewish\nrevolutionaries helped to spearhead the gruesome terror machine with a messianic fervor.\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-S49De7vWmbg/UfKv4tvFYKI/AAAAAAAAkwk/QwjdUy7fbmg/s1600/images.jpgjkiokgtko.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-S49De7vWmbg/UfKv4tvFYKI/AAAAAAAAkwk/QwjdUy7fbmg/s400/images.jpgjkiokgtko.jpg\" width=\"295\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of them, Matvei Berman, had helped\nto institutionalize slave labor as early as 1922.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gulag reached its\npeak after 1929 during the rule of Joseph Stalin , who used it to maintain the\nSoviet state by keeping its populace in a constant state of terror.. If one was\nto so much as steal a couple of potatoes, he &nbsp;could be sentenced to up to\nten years in the Gulag. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TA_ldGr_7LA/UfKvpAzhNaI/AAAAAAAAkwc/BM0SLN3TtLc/s1600/4365762_nagy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"255\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TA_ldGr_7LA/UfKvpAzhNaI/AAAAAAAAkwc/BM0SLN3TtLc/s400/4365762_nagy.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition the Gulag\nalso held political prisoners, those who were considered enemies of the immoral Jewish&nbsp; regime; anyone who stood out as a\nsmall threat was sent to a penal camp.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many innocent people were sentenced to\nthe Gulag for minor \u201ccrimes\u201d such as coming to work late three times\n(considered sabotage) or telling a small joke about a Jewish government\nofficial (punishable by up to 25 years). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Majority of the political prisoners who were\nsent to Gulag prison camps were innocent and weren't given as much as a trial.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prisoners were not\nloaded onto trains at the station in full public view; they were loaded at\nsidings down the track, away from public glare. It was done secretively - just\nas the process of arrest late at night.&nbsp;\nAnybody missing meant that person was in the Gulag or dead.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Bcb7xBMsCms/UfKvEa5T6zI/AAAAAAAAkwU/ltyzXLoay9w/s1600/images.jpgey4u.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Bcb7xBMsCms/UfKvEa5T6zI/AAAAAAAAkwU/ltyzXLoay9w/s1600/images.jpgey4u.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No matter the weather,\nthe captives were only allowed to wear the clothes they were arrested in.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prisoners received\ninsufficient clothing and inadequate food rations which made it difficult to\nendure the severe weather and the long working hours. As a result, the death\nrate from exhaustion and disease in the camps was enormously high.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But, to fulfill the\ncamps' economic goals, more and more prisoners were required, which accounts\nfor the rapid increase in camp populations in the 1930s. Eventually, every\nSoviet Secret Policeman was assigned a certain arrest quota in order to ensure\na large enough labor force in the Gulags, or they themselves would land up in\nthe gulag.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CM_Z2-tQQIE/UfKu5lI8M5I/AAAAAAAAkwM/seAPnaBykVY/s1600/images.jpgwt43y.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"226\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CM_Z2-tQQIE/UfKu5lI8M5I/AAAAAAAAkwM/seAPnaBykVY/s400/images.jpgwt43y.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to achieve\nthis quota, the Secret Police simply fabricated cases against ordinary,\ninnocent people (vividly described in Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn\u2019s short story \u201cOne\nDay in the Life of Ivan Denisovich\u201d).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During World War II,\nGulag populations declined sharply, owing to the mass release of hundreds of\nthousands of prisoners who were conscripted and sent directly to the front\nlines (often into penal battalions, who were thrown into the most dangerous\nbattles and experienced high casualty rates). Jewish commanders were told to\nshoot any Gulag prisioner&nbsp; who did not\nrisk his life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZGYyz9f5mvQ/UfKuCTjzTsI/AAAAAAAAkv8/ehXwM_2eMEg/s1600/images.jpgwtqaf.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"286\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZGYyz9f5mvQ/UfKuCTjzTsI/AAAAAAAAkv8/ehXwM_2eMEg/s400/images.jpgwtqaf.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the war, the\nnumber of inmates in prison camps and colonies again rose sharply, reaching\napproximately 2.5 million people by the early 1950s. The main reason for the\npost-war increase in the number of prisoners was the tightening of legislation\non property offenses in the summer of 1947. The result was hundreds of\nthousands of convictions to lengthy prison terms, often on the basis of petty\ntheft or embezzlement. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prisoners of war, in\ncontrast, were kept in a separate camp system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-F-zO0D8iJcs/UfKtl0CEKeI/AAAAAAAAkv0/CIBIW6NscTA/s1600/frozen-death_1024x768_20601.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-F-zO0D8iJcs/UfKtl0CEKeI/AAAAAAAAkv0/CIBIW6NscTA/s400/frozen-death_1024x768_20601.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the felled\ntrees rotted and never reached the lumber mills; many of the railroad lines and\ncanals the prisoners built were never used; and most of the construction was\nhopelessly shoddy. The prisoners\u2019 work was typically unskilled, manual, and\neconomically inefficient. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8DQmxGjlrUQ/UfKs8FwKGgI/AAAAAAAAkvk/AKhFF1Nhx4s/s1600/024.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"216\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8DQmxGjlrUQ/UfKs8FwKGgI/AAAAAAAAkvk/AKhFF1Nhx4s/s400/024.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People worked up to 14\nhours a day cutting trees, mining, and performing other physically exhausting\nactivities. When they were not working up to scratch, they would be called to\nline up in the forest and then shot down by machine guns. This cruel camp life\nlingered on until eventually, the entire Gulag system was deemed inefficient\nand abandoned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OQuuc-nZk-g/UfKs2avL4aI/AAAAAAAAkvc/q_Gae-yERg0/s1600/308_01A.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"216\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OQuuc-nZk-g/UfKs2avL4aI/AAAAAAAAkvc/q_Gae-yERg0/s400/308_01A.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not only had the USSR\nnot gained anything economically from the camps, they were also responsible for\nthe deaths of millions of prisoners (estimates vary from 1.6 million deaths,\nofficially documented by the Soviet Secret Police - NKVD - to 15 million\npeople, depending on the source).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qbRWS1ye0x8/UfKswhQVMNI/AAAAAAAAkvU/KI5lyfwrejY/s1600/344.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"345\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qbRWS1ye0x8/UfKswhQVMNI/AAAAAAAAkvU/KI5lyfwrejY/s400/344.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Stalin died in\n1953, the Gulag population was reduced significantly. The release of political\nprisoners started in 1954 and became widespread. It coupled with mass\nrehabilitations after Nikita Khrushchev' s denunciation of Stalinism in his\nSecret Speech at the 20th Congress of the Communist Party in February 1956.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dDyIpdGzhQY/UfKsp-uP-MI/AAAAAAAAkvM/IAE043iSDLk/s1600/1341851500_595714_1341939113_noticia_normal.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"448\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dDyIpdGzhQY/UfKsp-uP-MI/AAAAAAAAkvM/IAE043iSDLk/s400/1341851500_595714_1341939113_noticia_normal.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By\nthe end of the 1950s, virtually all \"corrective labor camps\" had been\ndissolved. Officially, the Gulag was liquidated by the MVD (Soviet Internal\nAffairs Ministry) Order 20 of 25 January 1960.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NDld_qNAu3E/UfKsk3jVCLI/AAAAAAAAkvE/nt_YK7IPwFA/s1600/478.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"345\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NDld_qNAu3E/UfKsk3jVCLI/AAAAAAAAkvE/nt_YK7IPwFA/s400/478.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Still, forced labor\ncamps continued to exist on a small scale right up to the Gorbachev period,\nwhen the government opened some camps to scrutiny by journalists and human\nrights activists. With the advancement of democratization, political prisoners\nand prisoners of conscience all but disappeared from the camps.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8wlwJwEVigw/UfKseO2dOdI/AAAAAAAAku8/qQ2mn9g2j50/s1600/disused-Stalinist-convict-007.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8wlwJwEVigw/UfKseO2dOdI/AAAAAAAAku8/qQ2mn9g2j50/s400/disused-Stalinist-convict-007.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though very well known\ninside the Soviet Union, the very name Gulag became familiar in the West only\nafter the publication of Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn's Nobel prize winning novel The\nGulag Archipelago (1973) which compared the scattered camps to a chain of\nislands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7pfoFAFq8go/UfKsXR3Qj3I/AAAAAAAAku0/Ylw8kDebnLs/s1600/gulag_kokorin_memorial_001-www-384x270.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"449\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7pfoFAFq8go/UfKsXR3Qj3I/AAAAAAAAku0/Ylw8kDebnLs/s400/gulag_kokorin_memorial_001-www-384x270.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His previous book on\nthe subject, One Day in the Life of Ivan Denisovich, about a typical day of a\nGulag inmate, was originally published in the most prestigious Soviet monthly,\nNovyi Mir (New World) in November 1962, but was soon banned and withdrawn from\nall libraries.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZgKWc9_19Bc/UfKsPoNFg-I/AAAAAAAAkuo/Nfji-8SwjPw/s1600/Shoah_Dachau-liberation.GIF\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"324\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZgKWc9_19Bc/UfKsPoNFg-I/AAAAAAAAkuo/Nfji-8SwjPw/s400/Shoah_Dachau-liberation.GIF\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was the first work to describe the Gulag as an instrument of\ngovernmental repression against its own citizens on such a massive scale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5CaWah48UL4/UfKtKdQNSMI/AAAAAAAAkvs/K9llAnaXTRg/s1600/images.jpggewry45e.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5CaWah48UL4/UfKtKdQNSMI/AAAAAAAAkvs/K9llAnaXTRg/s400/images.jpggewry45e.jpg\" width=\"286\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUESTION: HAVE YOU EVER BEEN CHILLED TO THE BONE MARROW?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then you do NOT understand human suffering in the Gulag. -&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Say a prayer for the unfortunate ones--</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">so that it never ever happens again..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wvEgHiAXq-o/UfKwtc9c2zI/AAAAAAAAkxE/ntUBzsoQJk8/s1600/gulag15.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"220\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wvEgHiAXq-o/UfKwtc9c2zI/AAAAAAAAkxE/ntUBzsoQJk8/s400/gulag15.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i>Above: &nbsp;Waiting for the Gulag-- intellectuals, &nbsp;dissidents, &nbsp;a father who stole a loaf of bread for his starving family etc</i></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Want to know Rothschild\nmedia power ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; The United States had fought two bitter wars against Britain: the War of Independence and the War of 1812.<br />\n<br />\nDuring the fall of 1863, the darkest hour of the Civil War, part of the Russian fleet arrived at the ports of New York and San Francisco.<br />\n<br />\nOn September 24, 1863 the Russian Baltic fleet began to arrive in New York harbor. On October 12, the same year, the Russian Far East fleet began to arrive in San Francisco. The squadrons stayed in American waters for about seven months.<br />\n<br />\nThe average American knows nothing of the 1812 war. US President Madison strategically sought an alliance with Russia because it was the only power in Europe which could command respect from both Rothschild poodles France and England..<br />\n<br />\nRussia\u2019s support of America through czar Alexander I helped to leverage the end of the War of 1812, enabling America to become a respected power on the world stage -- a phoenix. Czar Alexander proved to the world his might in 1814, when he defeated JEW Napoleon with his Russian army and its allied forces.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1817, Czar Alexander was convinced by the Holy Synod of the Russian Church that his ticket to heaven was to convert all the Jews in Russia to Russian Orthodoxy. He therefore attempted to do so by granting special privileges to those Jews who would convert.<br />\n<br />\nAlexander banned the Jews from having distilleries, which was traditionally a Jewish business. He also did not allow them to be landlords\u2019 agents for the collection of rents, another traditional Jewish line of work. He granted these rights to the Christian converts.<br />\n<br />\nHe established an organization called \u201cThe Society of Jewish Christians\u201d of which he was the patron.<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">HERE IS ROTHSCHILD SIGNATURE \u2013 A 100 YEARS LATER..</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; This makes\nyou wonder, are these Rabbis or spies?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>After completion of\nloading , these Rabbis in their black coats, fancy hats, hair curls , beards\nand shiny black shoes , will bless the cargo and seal up all openings , and\nthen issue a KOSHER certificate, after which the value of the same cargo goes\nup multiple fold. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Can you imagine a\npriest blessing your 100 rupee note and now hey presto! -- the note converts -\nnay - jumps to a 500 rupee note?&nbsp;&nbsp; This\nis what happens here.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>This concentrated\nAcetic acid is taken to Haifa and then another set of Rabbis will come, to\ncheck if all seals are intact and then the cargo is unloaded. The cargo is so\nclear that you can see the bottom steam coils of the stainless steel tank\n,through 15 metres depth.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Jews love to use\nvinegar as a pickling agent. \u201cKosher\u201d means \u201callowed\u201d, so, basically, the\n\u201cKosher Food\u201d are the allowed foodstuff on a Jewish diet.&nbsp;&nbsp; Leaves \u2013 all kinds of leaves, like lettuce,\ncabbage, watercress, celery, parsley, chives, etc.. often contains germs.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>In\norder to be used it should be left to soak for about half an hour in water with\nvinegar, acetic acid or germicide to kill ze worms--as per Jewish tradition. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Let me tell you, by\ndoin this , you have just removes 97% of the germs which your body could have\nhandled anyway, the balance surviving 3% is MORE harmful for you.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>OK,&nbsp; here is my advise as a Chemical man --take it\nor leave it..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Vinegar made from\nGlacial Acetic acid is harmful for the human body.&nbsp; First of all it is acidic and should not even\nqualify as a food . <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Acetic acid is NOT like\nCitrus or Lime juice which turn alkaline in your body.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Vinegar excessively\nstimulates the thyroid gland, leading to hyperthyroidism and eventually\nhypothyroidism and concomitant health issues such as endocrine disorders,\ncalcium metabolic disorders, metabolic rate disorders, fat metabolism problems,\nobesity/ body-weight issues, lethargy, headaches, premature ageing,&nbsp; and the classic bulging of the eyes.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>I am sure you know what I mean , if not ask\nyour non-Jewish&nbsp; friends .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The body pulls\nphosphorus from the adrenal glands to negate the effects of acetic acid in the\nsystem. Depeleted phosphorus results in impaired function of the adrenal glands\nand thus, again, the entire endocrine system.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The outcome of all this can\ninclude body odor, pains in the heart, rapid pulse, increased mucus production,\nchronic fatigue, and headaches. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Repetitive use of\nvinegar will also result in the hardening of the liver. So vinegar should not\nbe considered as \"food.\".&nbsp; GM\nvegetable foods grown out of TERMINATOR ( sterile ) seeds , make things worse\nfor kidneys.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">When you have all these problems for which the root cause is\nvinegar consumption, then to cure it you take modern Western Chemical\nmedicines, and a lot of them have bad side e</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ffects.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; line-height: 24px;\"><b>Vinegar also poses the risks of interacting with certain medications. For example, vinegar can interact with diuretics, which are used by patients to help lower their blood pressure. Diabetic patients also might find that vinegar interacts with insulin.</b></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Marx clung so dearly to Hegel that he ended up espousing a sort of \u201cCalvinism without God,\u201d turning Marxism into a quasi-religious ideology..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nHis Hegelian ideology led him to espouse a most unscientific socialism. Marx called his theory \u201cscientific socialism,\u201d not because he followed the scientific method, but merely because it was dialectical and materialist.&nbsp;</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nDialectics is not scientific as much as practical. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1525771090590#c7174753694009767256\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 8, 2018 at 2:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_4MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCommunism collapsed 3 decades ago\u2014but our JNU commie and pathetic commie leaders keep the ideology alive..<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild\u2019s cousin JEW Karl Marx did not invent communism. Radicals, including Pierre-Joseph Proudhon (1809-65) and the Chartist movement in England, had long used language that modern-day readers would identify as \u201cMarxist\u201d\u2014\u201cto enjoy political equality, abolish property\u201d; \u201creserve army of labour\u201d and so forth.<br />\n<br />\nWhat, then, was his contribution?<br />\n<br />\nMuch of his time was spent disagreeing with other radicals, attacking Proudhon in particular, whom he likened to one of the \u201cbourgeois economists\u201d. Far more significantly, he attempted to provide an overall theoretical description of how capitalism worked, especially in Das Kapital, which was published in 1867.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's Das Kapital, fails to mention that money is printed out of thin air and keeps the name of his cousins, the Rothschilds, out of it, despite the fact that they were the richest and most powerful capitalist family in the whole world\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild hired Marx to draft a social doctrine to invert moral order for centralizing their nation state\u2019s wealth Into Rothschild controlled coffers... Marx saw free trade as positive because it undermines established nations and cultures.<br />\n<br />\nMillions of people are still under the misapprehension that Marxism / Communism is against profiteering dishonest banks and multi national companies.. The Rothschild banking family - the richest and most powerful banksters, for the past 200 years - financed Karl Marx's pretense of an attack on the profiteering dishonest.banksters, in order to fool the masses, and it worked. ..<br />\n<br />\nMarx's hidden message was: \u201cForget your individual rights and privileges and trust in the State and the Trade Unions, and they'll do your thinking for you.\u201d ..Millions of people believed that nonsense, and subsequently allowed 'others' to do their thinking for them.<br />\n<br />\nThe trade unions and the governments are ALL working for the Rothschild's - who own the banks, including Bank of England, US Federal Reserve,and all the big multi national companies, dangle politicians like rag dolls and hold all of the people as tax-debt slaves, through their corrupt central banks and their funny money.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's writing style was a calamity: full of sometimes puerile vehemence, Marx heaped scorn on his opponents, inaugurating the long Marxist tradition of mercilessly deriding anyone with incorrect opinions. In Marx\u2019s pamphlets, mudslinging abounds: Marx's heavy-handed insults tend to make us doubt Marx himself, since he relies so much on vituperation instead of reasoned argument.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's conclusion that aggregate price and profit are determined by\u2014and equal to\u2014aggregate value and surplus value is bullshit. There goes his his theory that the exploitation of workers is the sole source of profit.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's essential idea, was that capitalism would become less and less profitable and that its downward spiral toward the abyss of deflation\u2014lower prices, lower profits\u2014would be followed by worldwide revolution.<br />\n<br />\nThe laws of dialectics at the very base of Marxism are fundamentally flawed-- some are \"truisms with no specific Marxist content\", others \"philosophical dogmas that cannot be proved by scientific means\", yet others just bullshit. Some Marxist \"laws\" are vague and can be interpreted differently, but these interpretations generally fall into one of the aforementioned categories of flaws as well.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_4BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; He finished the first. But when it came to writing the second, on realizing that he would face insurmountable intellectual hurdles ( including being charged of mindless plagiarism ) , he pleaded illness.. when in reality he was fit as a fiddle and going around doing everything else.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhat Marx accomplished was to produce such a comprehensive, dramatic, and fascinating vision that it could withstand innumerable empirical contradictions, logical refutations, and moral revulsions at its effects.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Marxian vision took the overwhelming complexity of the real world and made the parts fall into place, in a way that was intellectually exhilarating and conferred such a sense of moral superiority that opponents could be simply labelled and dismissed as moral lepers or blind reactionaries.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarxism was \u2013 and remains \u2013 a mighty instrument for the acquisition and maintenance of political power.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nKarl Marx's value theory and law of the tendency of the rate of profit to fall are a crock of shit.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarx does not even understand socialism. Socialism cannot be accomplished only through class conflict and a proletarian revolution.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DECLARES DAS KAPITAL IS THE BIGGEST TUB OF BULLSHIT.. EVER WRITTEN</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations, Jew Rothschild\u2019s agent Adam Smith proposed that the free market, where producers are free to produce as much as they want and charge consumers the prices they want, would result in the most efficient and desirable economic outcome for consumers and producers alike due to the \u201cInvisible Hand.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe rationale for his proposal was that each individual would try to maximize his own benefit. In doing so, consumers would only pay as much as or less than they would value the benefit derived from a good, and producers would only sell for as much as or higher than they would have spent on producing a good.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn his idealistic economy, there would be no surplus or deficit supply or demand; markets would always be in equilibrium, and the benefits to consumers and producers alike would be maximized. There would be a limited role for the government in such an economic system.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn contrast, Karl Marx in his Das Kapital reasoned that workers would be exploited by any capitalist, or factory owners, for the capitalist system provides an inherent advantage to the already rich and a disadvantage to the already poor segments of society. The rich would get richer and the poor would get poorer. Furthermore, the \u201ccapitalist\u201d is always in a better position to negotiate a low wage for his workers, he argued.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOne of his notable and more contentious theories \u2013 the labor theory of value \u2013 claims that the value of a good or service is directly connected to the amount of labor required for its production. Interestingly, Karl Marx also had his own drastic, political ideas that were far away from those of Adam Smith\u2019s.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: small;\">Adam Smith? The socialist revolution would occur first in the most advanced capitalist nations and once collective ownership had been established then all sources of class conflict would disappear.<br />\n<br />\nInstead of Marx's predictions, communist revolutions took place in undeveloped regions in Latin America and Asia instead of industrialized countries like the United States or the United Kingdom\u2014all orchestrated by immoral white JEWS .<br />\n<br />\nMarxists used dialectic as a method of side-stepping and evading criticisms, rather than actually answering or addressing them..<br />\n<br />\nMarxism has established itself as a dogmatism which is elastic enough, by using its dialectic method, to evade any further attack\u2014 a MAD form of reinforced dogmatism<br />\n<br />\nFORGET ABOUT RULE OF THE PEOPLE \u2013 MARXIST COMMUNISM CREATED THE WORST DESPOTS WHO RULED WITH THE LOADED GUN . Despot commie leaders and their communist regime eliminated all those who opposed forced collectivization.<br />\n<br />\nIn communism, individualism makes room for the collective. Ideals like freedom of speech were considered dangerous to the Communist party. Whither freedom ?<br />\n<br />\nCommunist ideology ceased to exist is because it was not able to adapt to outside conditions. Certain forms of communism, like the one practiced in China, managed to survive this long because it was able to react to outside stimuli such as the global economy and social changes.( sic ).. Commie leaders did not have the cerebral wherewithal to create change for the better \u2013 if any citizen tried to point faults at the leadership\u2014he was shot dead for being a DAMN DISSIDENT<br />\n<br />\nEconomy dictates that the price of a product is formed when the offer meets demand. Also, there are other financial mechanisms used to determine prices and to regulate competitiveness on the global market. On the other hand, the communist doctrine thought that the only way of distributing wealth was to form a so-called command economy, an organism that would determine how the resources should be spent. Naturally, this type of economy will substantially increase the disparity between those who were in charge and the layman.<br />\n<br />\nThe history of communism is riddled with tales of atrocities committed against those who did not embrace the communist doctrine.<br />\n<br />\nFamine, mass executions, overwork, are tools of the trade which shaped the communism blood-thirsty demeanor.<br />\n<br />\nThe society envisioned by Rothschild agents JEWS--Marx, Engels, Lenin, Stalin and others is just a utopia, making communism the grandest and most CHOOTIYA social experiment ever performed by humankind. In late 1921, Lenin's health deteriorated and Lenin favoured Trotsky against Stalin.<br />\n<br />\nIn January 1923, Lenin amended his Testament to suggest that Stalin should be removed as the party's general secretary..<br />\n<br />\nThe relationship between Stalin and Lenin had broken down completely by this time, as was demonstrated during an event where Stalin crudely insulted Lenin's wife, Nadezhda Krupskaya. In March 1923, days before his third stroke, Lenin asked Trotsky to denounce Stalin and his so-called \"Great-Russian nationalistic campaign\" at the XIIth Party Congress.<br />\n<br />\nJEW Stalin ( Rothschild blood and groomed in Baku ) wielded more power with Rothschild \u2014Stalin did not like Trotsky.<br />\n<br />\nIn October 1927, Trotsky was expelled from the Central Committee\u2014see Rothschild blood is thicker than water<br />\n<br />\nIn February 1929, Trotsky was deported from the Soviet Union to Turkey. On 20 August 1940, in his study, Trotsky was attacked by Ram\u00f3n Mercader an assassin sent by Stalin ( ice axe as a weapon)\u2014Trotsky with an injured head ,fought back, broke the assassins arm and his guards killed the assassin. Trotsky died the next day, knowing who sent the assassin.<br />\n<br />\nTrotsky's last words were \"I will not survive this attack. Stalin has finally accomplished the task he attempted unsuccessfully before.\"<br />\n<br />\nJEW Trotsky was one of the seven members of the first Politburo, founded in 1917 to manage the Bolshevik Revolution. In reality he was the prime force. Stalin expelled Trotsky from the Communist Party in November 1927.<br />\n<br />\nTHE NEOCONS IN AMERICA TODAY ARE FOLLOWERS OF TROTSKY DOCTRINE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-part-two-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nKARL MARX AND JON DEWEY PLANNED THE RUSSIAN REVOLUTION IN ADVANCE..<br />\n<br />\nBOTH DEWEY AND MARX APPROACHED THE COMMIE REVOLUTION FROM OPPOSITE ANGLES\u2014MARX FROM OUTSIDE TO INWARDS AND DEWEY FROM INSIDE TO OUTWARDS ..THERE WAS NO SCOPE FOR FAILURE..<br />\n<br />\nJOHN DEWEY WAS 41 YEARS YOUGER THAN MARX\u2014 AND WAS FAR SMARTER..<br />\n<br />\nMarx worked to achieve a political revolution originating from an oppressed group outside the state while Dewey advanced a reformist agenda of state-led political meliorism.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/exhuming-dirty-secrets-of-holodomor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nDewey\u2019s visited Soviet Russia a decade after the Bolshevik revolution to advise Stalin who was NOT a thinker..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/05/discretion-subjective-objective-value.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Rothschild\u2019s agents Indian commies&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">MN Roy&nbsp;</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">and&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Abani Mukherji</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;were tutored in Mexico by Rothschild\u2019 man JEW John Dewey. , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">At every moment, may I\nfind pleasure in \u015ahiva, Whose head is glorified by the &nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">unsteady waves of Nilimpanirjhar\u012b ( Celestial Ga\u0144g\u0101)\nagitating unsteadily in the deep well of his matted hair-locks, Who has a brilliant\nblazing fire at the surface of forehead, and Who has a crescent-moon as a jewel\non his forehead.[2]</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">For a long time, may \u015ahiva\n\u2014 Whose foot-stool is grey due to the series of pollen dust from flowers at the\nhead of Indra (Sahasralocana) and all other demi-gods, Whose matted hairlocks\nare tied by a garland of the king of snakes, and Who has a head-jewel of the\nfriend of cakora bird \u2014 produce prosperity.[5]</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0932\u0932\u093e\u091f\u091a\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0930\u091c\u094d\u0935\u0932\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0928\u091e\u094d\u091c\u092f\u0938\u094d\u092b\u0941\u0932\u093f\u0919\u094d\u0917\u092d\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">When will I worship\nLord Sad\u0101\u015biva with an equal vision towards varied ways of the world, a snake or\na pearl-garland, royal-gems or a lump of dirt, friend or enemy , a grass-eyed\nor a lotus-eyed person, and common men or the king.[12]</span><span style=\"color: red;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Living in the\nhollow of a tree in the thickets of River Ga\u0144g\u0101, always free from\nill-thinking, bearing a\u00f1jali at the forehead, free from lustful eyes, and\nforehead and head bonded, when will I become content while reciting the mantra\n\u2018\u2018\u015ahiva?\u2019\u2019[13]</span><span style=\"color: red;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
