, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UjWXFVKdD5Y/Ud6f7W1mtAI/AAAAAAAAkL0/X_i3dAAbcVY/s1600/images.jpgsfwg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UjWXFVKdD5Y/Ud6f7W1mtAI/AAAAAAAAkL0/X_i3dAAbcVY/s1600/images.jpgsfwg.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adrenaline is a hormone\nand a neurotransmitter.. It regulates heart rate, blood vessel and air passage\ndiameters, and metabolic shifts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adrenaline (epinephrine)\nis &nbsp;released is a crucial component of\nthe fight-or-flight response of the sympathetic nervous system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The adrenal glands are\nfound directly above the kidneys in the human body, and are roughly 3 inches in\nlength. Along with norepinephrine and dopamine, it is a catecholamine, which is\na group of hormones released in response to stress. These three hormones react\nwith various body tissues, preparing the body to react physically to the stress\ncausing situation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VSbA0Vdwb3E/Ud8VE30k4WI/AAAAAAAAkMs/ekZdrUnyITY/s1600/adrenal.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"276\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VSbA0Vdwb3E/Ud8VE30k4WI/AAAAAAAAkMs/ekZdrUnyITY/s320/adrenal.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a person encounters\na potentially dangerous situation, like seeing a cobra with read up hood in\nyour bed room , the hypothalamus in the brain signals the adrenal glands to\nrelease adrenaline and other hormones directly into the bloodstream. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body's systems react to these hormones\nwithin seconds, giving the person a nearly instant physical boost. &nbsp;Strength and speed both increase, while the\nbody's ability to feel pain decreases. &nbsp;This\nhormonal surge is ze &nbsp;\"adrenaline\nrush.\". &nbsp;This hormone causes\nheightened awareness and increased respiration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When there is stress\nbut no actual danger, a person can be left feeling restless and irritable. This\nis partly because adrenaline causes the body to release glucose, raising blood\nsugar, and giving the body energy that has no outlet. &nbsp;High levels of adrenaline in the blood can\nlead to insomnia and jittery nerves, and are often an indicator of chronic\nstress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I used to be Captain of\nfast container ships. Once the ship reaches the English Channel, the Captain\ncannot sleep. &nbsp;There is heavy traffic , dense\nfog or bad weather. &nbsp;Those days , in the\nearly eighties there was no GPS and the radars were useless. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oLnc0IELQ7g/Ud8Vn4oZd_I/AAAAAAAAkM0/kezAdM2wQnk/s1600/adrenal-gland-chart.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"277\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oLnc0IELQ7g/Ud8Vn4oZd_I/AAAAAAAAkM0/kezAdM2wQnk/s400/adrenal-gland-chart.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then there are long\nriver passages with very short distance between the sea ports like London,\nAmsterdam, Antwerp, Hamburg, Bremen, Rotterdam. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The port stay is a few hours and I need to\ntake my wife out for a shore leave jaunt too.&nbsp;\nSometimes for three full days the Captain cannot sleep at all. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have noticed that fatigue is only on the\nfirst day. The remaining two days I am alert.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then finally when the ship comes\nout of the English Channel and plunges into the Atlantic enroute New York, the\nCaptain must indeed sleep. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But he\ncannot sleep as his body is supercharged with</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> CORTISOL</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">, even after taking\nsome alcohol.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BEVGyu2X_kI/Ud_Kp2V2GEI/AAAAAAAAkNY/LQUL8ZGDjr8/s1600/ZCDG.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"247\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BEVGyu2X_kI/Ud_Kp2V2GEI/AAAAAAAAkNY/LQUL8ZGDjr8/s320/ZCDG.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You just toss and turn in bed.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The stress system\nrelies on two key hormones: adrenaline and cortisol. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cortisol is a steroid hormone, &nbsp;produced by the adrenal glands. &nbsp;During the stress response, massive levels of\ncortisol are released by the adrenal glands to provide us with more energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Too much cortisol can</span></b>\nsuppress the immune system, suppress pain, increase blood pressure and sugar,\ndecrease libido, loss of muscle mass ,&nbsp; trigger\ninsulin resistance, increase sugar and carbohydrate cravings&nbsp;&nbsp; and <b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red;\">contribute to obesity ( fat deposits on\nthe belly ) and IMPAIR SLEEP.</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/jmRHVXm-3j0/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/jmRHVXm-3j0&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/jmRHVXm-3j0&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adrenaline works in the\nshort term, while cortisol has large momentum and works in the long term. &nbsp;Just as your levels of adrenaline start coming\ndown, so rises the amount of cortisol flowing through your veins. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DDCgEMFDxSI/Ud_NaLTJ6WI/AAAAAAAAkN4/Mmv3h5PAX58/s1600/images.jpggyuvfi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"208\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DDCgEMFDxSI/Ud_NaLTJ6WI/AAAAAAAAkN4/Mmv3h5PAX58/s400/images.jpggyuvfi.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moreover, cortisol has\na much larger momentum than adrenaline, which means that even though it builds\nup slowly, it also takes a long time to go back to normal. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1BZNlFJcBxU/Ud_M-B4NQ4I/AAAAAAAAkNo/mBDBtTOXfro/s1600/excess-steroids-can-cause-obesity-246x300.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And should you\nconstantly be engaging in activities which require adrenaline, so will your\nlevels of cortisol slowly increase.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Fjzf6J3KCzM/Ud_N9eFmIgI/AAAAAAAAkOA/1yAEWoGhnX8/s1600/images.jpgigbb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"243\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Fjzf6J3KCzM/Ud_N9eFmIgI/AAAAAAAAkOA/1yAEWoGhnX8/s320/images.jpgigbb.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a a\nthreat is perceived, a signal is sent to the brain. The brain then sends nerve\nimpulses to the adrenal gland in the kidneys. &nbsp;When the nerve signal reaches the\nadrenal gland, chromaffin cells, in the medulla of the adrenal gland, release\nepinephrine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epinephrine then enters\nthe bloodstream. It is thus carried around the body to cells in various\nlocations, where it initiates several responses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite initiating\nseveral different responses, epinephrine\u2019s effects have a collective purpose \u2013\nto provide INSTANT energy so that the major muscles of the body can respond to\nthe perceived threat.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/06jbq3bxKE0/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/06jbq3bxKE0&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/06jbq3bxKE0&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An adrenaline rush has\ngiven mothers the super human strength to lift cars from over their dead\nchildren. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In school I used to get\nkicked on my shins while playing soccer. Till the game is over it does NOT\npain. For once the adrenaline wears off, you'll be able to feel the pain . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the same time it is\na paradox that your vision to your touch, your senses will be dramatically\nheightened when you are undergoing an adrenaline rush. &nbsp;Because everything happens so fast during an\nadrenaline rush, your breathing and your heart rate will jump suddenly.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your\nblood pressure will also go up, and you may even start to sweat to prevent your\nmuscles from getting overworked during an adrenaline rush.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nutrients are\nreleased to sustain muscular activity and blood flow is regulated away from\nless important organs to the muscles to prepare for a fight. The body keeps up\nthis preparation until it no longer feels threatened. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An initial rush of adrenaline makes you feel\nempowered, like you can conquer the world. &nbsp;The decrease in adrenaline afterwards is known\nas the adrenaline crash, and this can make you feel anxious or even negative. Those\nwho suffer from depression have been found to experience an extremely drastic\ndrop in adrenaline. After a marriage celebration you can usually see everybody\npooped .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caffeine is the most\nwidely used drug in the world. Most &nbsp;morning&nbsp;\ncoffee drinkers don't realize it, but their morning cups of coffee set\ntheir bodies up for a rollercoaster day of highs and lows, only to bottom out\nat the point of exhaustion. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just a few\nhours after consumption, when the artificial high dies down, many people may\nreach for more coffee or something sugary to get another lift, leading to daily\nfluctuations in energy and alertness, and possibly to eventual chronic adrenal\nexhaustion.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The excessive caffeine\nconsumption has simply pushed your adrenal glands so much that they've burned\nout. &nbsp;Caffeine affects your body just\nlike any drug. You start taking it slowly, but as your body develops a\ntolerance to it, you need more and more to feel the same effects.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caffeine\nincreases the stimulating neurohormone, noradrenaline, and reduces the calming\nneurotransmitter, serotonin. Caffeine also stimulates the production of\nnorepinephrine, another stress hormone that acts directly on the brain and\nnervous system. Caffeine works by making an ass out of a hormone that tells the\nadrenal glands to crank out more adrenaline.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like caffeine &nbsp;nicotine too overstimulate the adrenal glands.\nCaffeine can have a detrimental effect on blood sugar. When caffeine is\ningested, the nervous system is stimulated. Adrenaline is released and, in\nturn, the liver begins to emit stored blood sugar. Insulin is then released,\nand blood sugar drops below normal\u2014a common seizure trigger for people with\nepilepsy. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caffeine also constricts &nbsp;blood vessels in the brain. &nbsp;Caffiene stimulates the release of stored\nsugar from the liver\u2014same thing what coca cola does. Avoid caffeine -- it\nincreases the stress hormones and adrenaline, which causes a spike in blood\nsugar. &nbsp;These quick-fix solutions to\nlagging energy and poor mood fuel your fatigue and depression and aggravate\nfood craving.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caffeinism usually combines physical addiction with a wide range\nof debilitating effects, most notably anxiety, irritability, mood swings, sleep\ndisturbance, depression, and fatigue. Caffeine does not provide energy\u2014only\nchemical stimulation. The perceived \"energy\" comes from the body's\nstruggle to adapt to increased blood levels of stress hormones. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RtNlQvAB0rQ/Ud8WtVfzHMI/AAAAAAAAkNE/UvhObgux8cE/s1600/images.jpgghhc+mm.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RtNlQvAB0rQ/Ud8WtVfzHMI/AAAAAAAAkNE/UvhObgux8cE/s1600/images.jpgghhc+mm.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caffeine is the Trojan horse. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It looks like a gift but instead delivers\nadrenal stress, low blood sugar, mood and energy swings, fatigue, depression,\nmalnutrition, and disturbed sleep.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caffeine depletes the body of B vitamins,\nwhich you need for proper brain and nervous system functioning and for\nconverting food to energy. with caffeine, we don't provide the glands anything\nto make that hormone out of\u2014we just cry \"emergency\" and force them to\nfigure it out, one way or another. So the body reaches down into its reserves\nand makes more hormone because it thinks it is the right thing to do.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caffeine\nforces your glands to secrete when they don't have much left to give, and they\nhave to keep digging deeper and deeper, making you more and more tired over\ntime. Caffeine is clearly addictive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-B8BHv52e94Q/Ud7u6cUXPwI/AAAAAAAAkMU/CEuNW6gA3ws/s1600/styuolgu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although Starbucks\nnotes that the caffeine levels of these drinks may vary, they are listed on the\nStarbucks website as:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
